T02D2503-1:1b-1: ko sa la aa lam k'a ra ya tattva sam gra ha t'i k'a /
T02D2503-1:1b-3: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad pa ko sa la'i rgyan /
T02D2503-1:1b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen [dd] po dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2503-1:1b-5: rgyud bdag dang ni rgyal bzhi dang po'i sems dpa' dang //
T02D2503-1:1b-6: rgyal sras lhag ma rnams dang rigs kyi yum rnams dang //
T02D2503-1:1b-7: rab mchog las mdzad mchod pa bzhi dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D2503-1:1b-8: rgyud dang snying po rig bcas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2503-1:1b-9: chos tshul zab mo'i rgya mtshor shin tu zhugs gyur cing //
T02D2503-1:1b-10: ye shes mtsho chen de nyid ma lus bdag po mdzad //
T02D2503-1:1b-11: shes rab bdud rtsi las byung dri med byis pa'i gzugs //
T02D2503-1:1b-12: bde gshegs sras po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2503-1:1b-13: rgyal rnams 'dus las bka' thob rnam par rgyal bar ldan //
T02D2503-1:1b-14: 'gro la phan phyir 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mdzad //
T02D2503-1:1b-15: lha mi rnams la rgyud ston bcom ldan gang yin pa //
T02D2503-1:1b-16: rgyal dbang rdo rje 'dzin pa de la'ang rab tu 'dud //
T02D2503-1:1b-17: grong khyer bzang por sangs rgyas sde zhes grags thob gang //
T02D2503-1:2a-1: ma'i mchog de dang por rab dad mnyes byas te //
T02D2503-1:2a-2: gnang ba mnos shing cho gas dam tshig thob nas ni //
T02D2503-1:2a-3: de la shin tu mang thos mang du rnam par dpyad //
T02D2503-1:2a-4: kong ka nir ni dra mi da dang dbang phyug dpal 'dus dang //
T02D2503-1:2a-5: chos sde chos kyi 'byung gnas dga' bas bsnyen bkur byas //
T02D2503-1:2a-6: sa h+yer chos kyi rdo rje mchog tu mtshan gsol dang //
T02D2503-1:2a-7: gtsug tor rdo rje'ang mang du legs par bsnyen bkur byas //
T02D2503-1:2a-8: yon tan 'byung gnas byang phyogs au rgyan yul bgrod de //
T02D2503-1:2a-9: rgyud don de nyid 'dzin rgyal aindra bh'u ti bsnyen //
T02D2503-1:2a-10: tag kyer grong khyer ka sha la yi slob dpon ni //
T02D2503-1:2a-11: blo brtan blo gros 'byung gnas tshul mkhas gus pas bsten //
T02D2503-1:2a-12: bla ma'i zhal nas yang dag man ngag gang las ni //
T02D2503-1:2a-13: cung zad bdag gis ci rtogs dag pa'i lung gi tshul //
T02D2503-1:2a-14: 'jig rten rnal 'byor cho gas slob dpon bzhin rim gyis //
T02D2503-1:2a-15: 'di ni yun ring gnas phyir bdag gis rnam par bsams //
T02D2503-1:2a-16: 'gro ngan bdag pas blo dman mi rnams gang yin pa //
T02D2503-1:2a-17: de la phan gdags phyir ni rang gi stobs bskyed de //
T02D2503-1:2a-18: gang du de nyid don bsdus tshul ni rnam ston pa'i //
T02D2503-1:2a-19: de nyid bsdus te bdag gis gus pas rnam par dbye //
T02D2503-1:2a-20: rgyud 'dir rgyud kyi bdag po rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D2503-1:2b-0: phyug dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad @2b kyi yon
T02D2503-1:2b-1: tan gyi gleng gzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:2b-2: cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba
T02D2503-1:2b-3: nas brtsams te / rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
T02D2503-1:2b-4: de nas gzhan yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyud nas brtsams te /
T02D2503-1:2b-5: de skad ces bka' stsal zhes bya ba'i bar ni rgyud do //
T02D2503-1:2b-6: rgyud 'di la yang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
T02D2503-1:2b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang dag par
T02D2503-1:2b-8: sdud par byed pas mngon sum du thos par ston
T02D2503-1:2b-9: to // de yang 'di skad ston te /
T02D2503-1:2b-10: bdag nyid kyis thos kyi gzhan dag las brgyud de thos pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-1:2b-11: khyod kyis dus gang gi tshe thos she na /
T02D2503-1:2b-12: dus gcig na zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:2b-13: lan cig gi dus tshod na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:2b-14: da ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas gleng gzhi ston to //
T02D2503-1:2b-15: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bcom
T02D2503-1:2b-16: pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das te nges
T02D2503-1:2b-17: pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na yi ge bsgyur ba
T02D2503-1:2b-22: gang gis rgyud 'di ston par mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi
T02D2503-1:2b-23: bdag po bcom ldan 'das 'di yon tan ji lta
T02D2503-1:2b-25: de nas gzhan yang de'i yon tan ni de bzhin
T02D2503-1:2b-26: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs
T02D2503-1:2b-27: dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D2503-1:2b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2503-1:2b-29: yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do
T02D2503-1:2b-30: // de yang ji ltar gnas pa'i don de thugs
T02D2503-1:2b-31: su chud cing sangs rgyas pas na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:2b-33: rtogs pa'i don thams cad ni gshegs pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:2b-34: 'dir thams cad kyi sgra ni mtha' thug pa med pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2503-1:2b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ston par byed pa'o //
T02D2503-1:2b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid rdo rje yin
T02D2503-1:2b-37: pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
T02D2503-1:2b-38: rje ste / mi phyed pa nyid kyis dngos po thams cad kyi don 'byed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:2b-39: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni sprul pa ste /
T02D2503-1:2b-40: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs te /
T02D2503-1:3a-0: snying po dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang sems dpa'i @3a * //
T02D2503-1:3a-1: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2503-1:3a-2: 'di nyid ni dam tshig yin pas na de bzhin
T02D2503-1:3a-3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs
T02D2503-1:3a-4: dang dam tshig ces bya ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-5: tshul de ltar rnam par gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2503-1:3a-6: po mthong ba la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin par
T02D2503-1:3a-7: gnang ba'i phyir de dag thams cad kyang dam tshig
T02D2503-1:3a-8: gi sgra nyid du bshad do //
T02D2503-1:3a-9: de lta bu'i dam tshig mkhyen pa la ni dam tshig gi ye shes zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-11: de'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni khyad par rnam pa du ma ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-12: rigs dang rtog pa dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D2503-1:3a-13: dbye bas shin tu yang rnam pa tha dad pa'o

T02D2503-1:3a-17: dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-18: rgyud las gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las la mchog tu mkhas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:3a-19: tshig 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das de mchog tu yang dam tshig la mkhas par ston to //
T02D2503-1:3a-20: gal te dam tshig shes pa yin du zin kyang
T02D2503-1:3a-21: dbang bskur ba med par sngags sbyin pa dang gzung
T02D2503-1:3a-22: ba la sogs pa bya bar mi rigs so zhes
T02D2503-1:3a-23: bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-1:3a-24: rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-1:3a-25: sogs pa'i gzhung nye bar dgod par mdzad pa yin
T02D2503-1:3a-26: te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid rin
T02D2503-1:3a-27: po che yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:3a-28: cad kyi rin po che ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-29: rnyed par dka' ba'i don dang /

T02D2503-1:3a-32: rab tu snang ba'i don gyis na rin po che dang 'dra bas na rin po che ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-33: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba ni au dumw'ar [*autpala?] dang 'dra bas na rnyed par dka' ba ste /
T02D2503-1:3a-34: dus dpag tu med par sbyangs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:3a-35: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i rin gyis rnyed pas na rin che ba'o //
T02D2503-1:3a-36: 'khor ba thams cad kyi dbul ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2503-1:3a-37: sdug bsngal yang dag par gcod par byed pa'i don
T02D2503-1:3a-38: dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2503-1:3a-39: bde ba dang yid bde ba shin tu rnam par
T02D2503-1:3a-40: dag ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i don gyis na don
T02D2503-1:3a-42: phyi dang nang gi mun pa sel ba'i don gyis na rab tu snang ba ste /
T02D2503-1:3b-0: de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa @3b lnga po

T02D2503-1:3b-2: pa'i dbu rgyan ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2503-1:3b-3: kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan no //
T02D2503-1:3b-7: khams gsum po na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bag
T02D2503-1:3b-8: chags dang bcas pa rnams spangs pas shin tu yang
T02D2503-1:3b-9: dri ma med par gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs

T02D2503-1:3b-11: chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi mdzod brnyes par gyur
T02D2503-1:3b-12: pas na khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ste
T02D2503-1:3b-13: bdag po'o // des na de'i rtags su rin po
T02D2503-1:3b-14: che'i cod pan des dbang bskur ba de brnyes par

T02D2503-1:3b-18: dbang bskur ba thob tu zin kyang rnal 'byor bsgom
T02D2503-1:3b-19: pa la dbang ma thob na sems can gyi don
T02D2503-1:3b-21: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-1:3b-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-1:3b-24: thams cad ni shes bya ma lus pa ste /
T02D2503-1:3b-25: rtag par thams cad mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2503-1:3b-26: de'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2503-1:3b-27: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de nyid ni rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D2503-1:3b-28: de yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel bar 'jug pa'i lam yin te /
T02D2503-1:3b-29: zhi gnas ni ting nge 'dzin la sems pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2503-1:3b-30: sems gang dmigs par bya ba gcig la rab tu 'jog pa'o //
T02D2503-1:3b-31: lhag mthong ni shes rab ste /
T02D2503-1:3b-32: de yang sems las byung ba chos rab tu rnams
T02D2503-1:3b-33: par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid can te mnyam par 'jog
T02D2503-1:3b-34: pa'i sems kyis 'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o
T02D2503-1:3b-36: 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:3b-37: 'di ni rnam par byang ba'o zhes rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2503-1:3b-38: zhi gnas shas che na ni sems rmugs pa'i nye bar g-yeng bar 'gyur la /
T02D2503-1:3b-39: lhag mthong shas che na ni rgod pa'i nye bar g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:3b-40: de bas na rim bzhin du snang ba yid la byed pa dang /
T02D2503-1:3b-41: mi rtag pa yid la byed pas kyang nye bar
T02D2503-1:3b-42: g-yeng ba'i dngos po gnyis bzlog nas bsam par bya
T02D2503-1:3b-43: ba'i dngos po de la zung du 'jug par gnas
T02D2503-1:4a-0: la / dran pa'i thag pas gang dang gang du zhi gnas dang @4a * //

T02D2503-1:4a-6: pa med par 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:4a-7: // thabs nges mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du

T02D2503-1:4a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor chen po zhes bshad la /
T02D2503-1:4a-14: de gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs

T02D2503-1:4a-27: chub sems dpa' bcu drug yongs su gzung ngo //

T02D2503-1:4a-33: nyid ni mtshungs pa nyid do //

T02D2503-1:4a-40: sgrub par mdzad pas na phyag rgya thams cad mnyam
T02D2503-1:4a-41: pa nyid du gyur pa ste /
T02D2503-1:4a-42: 'di ni kun rdzob kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2503-1:4a-44: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D2503-1:4a-45: bsdus pas khu tshur zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:4a-47: don dam par ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid

T02D2503-1:4b-4: shes nas lus dang ngag dang yid shin tu brtan

T02D2503-1:5a-1: phongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams skyong bar mdzad pas na thugs rje ste /

T02D2503-1:5a-3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba
T02D2503-1:5a-4: rnams kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyi yul nas ji srid
T02D2503-1:5a-5: khams gsum po na spyod pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2503-1:5a-6: kyang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis zin pa de
T02D2503-1:5a-7: la thugs rje chen pos skyong bar mdzad pa'i thugs
T02D2503-1:5a-8: rje chen po mnga' bas na thugs rje chen po'o
T02D2503-1:5a-9: // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang
T02D2503-1:5a-10: phyug rnams la yang thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2503-1:5a-11: snyam pa la rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba

T02D2503-1:5a-15: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad
T02D2503-1:5a-16: las shin tu rnam par grol ba'i thugs rje chen
T02D2503-1:5a-17: po yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin
T02D2503-1:5a-18: no // yun ring por dka' ba brnyes nas re

T02D2503-1:5a-20: kyang 'di lta bur yun ring du bzhugs par mi
T02D2503-1:5a-21: no // bya'am zhe na / rtag pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:5a-22: rtag pa zhes smos pas chos kyi sku la bya ste /
T02D2503-1:5a-23: mi 'gyur bar rtag pas rtag par yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2503-1:5a-24: ye shes kyi sku yang rnam grangs kyi rtag pas
T02D2503-1:5a-25: rgyun gyi rtag pa can te gnas gyur pa'i mtshan
T02D2503-1:5a-26: nyid du 'khor ba ji srid par rgyun du rjes
T02D2503-1:5a-27: su 'jug pa yin pas na ye shes kyi sku
T02D2503-1:5a-29: gal te rtag pa yin na ji ltar na 'das
T02D2503-1:5a-30: pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
T02D2503-1:5a-31: sangs rgyas su brjod ce na /
T02D2503-1:5a-32: de'i lan du dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:5a-33: dus ni brda ste kun rdzob tu dus gsum dag
T02D2503-1:5a-34: tu gzugs kyi sku yang ye shes kyi sku la
T02D2503-1:5a-35: ltos nas rnam par gnas pa'i sku mnga' bas na
T02D2503-1:5a-36: dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs pa'i sku zhes bya
T02D2503-1:5a-37: ste / sku 'di gnyis ni 'dus byas yin pa'i
T02D2503-1:5a-38: phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
T02D2503-1:5a-40: ye shes kyi sku ni rnam par grangs kyi rtag pa nyid du bshad pa kho na'o //
T02D2503-1:5a-41: gal te skad cig mi rtag pa nyid kyis ye
T02D2503-1:5b-0: shes @5b kyi sku yang dus gsum du bzung na
T02D2503-1:5b-1: ni mi rtag pa nyid yin na /
T02D2503-1:5b-2: ci'i phyir gzhan gyis mi shigs pa yin zhes 'di
T02D2503-1:5b-3: la phyogs snga ma rtog pas de'i phyir sku dang
T02D2503-1:5b-4: gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2503-1:5b-5: gsungs te / rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:5b-6: go rims ji skad du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:5b-7: pa'i chos ni sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar
T02D2503-1:5b-8: gyur pa yin pa'i phyir thugs mi phyed pa yin

T02D2503-1:5b-10: sgra yang ji skad bshad pa'i thugs kyi rgyun la
T02D2503-1:5b-11: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i khyad par rnams kyis

T02D2503-1:5b-14: gsum char yang rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2503-1:5b-15: de bas na sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad
T02D2503-1:5b-16: rdo rje lta bur gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2503-1:5b-19: chud pa de bzhin du chos nyid thugs su chud
T02D2503-1:5b-20: pas na sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste
T02D2503-1:5b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs su chud pa'i don
T02D2503-1:5b-23: yang na chos rnams ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin

T02D2503-1:5b-26: gshegs pa'o // de dag gis ni dam tshig mkhyen

T02D2503-1:5b-28: pas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni slob dpon gyi mchog
T02D2503-1:5b-29: tu gyur par bstan pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:5b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa 'ba' zhig

T02D2503-1:6a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @6a * //
T02D2503-1:6a-2: bstod pa 'ba' zhig tu'ang ma zad kyi nor bu
T02D2503-1:6a-3: dang rin po che chen pos spras pa yang yin

T02D2503-1:6a-6: po yang yin pas na nor bu dang rin po

T02D2503-1:6a-9: nor bu dang rin po che chen pos spras pa

T02D2503-1:6a-21: rnga ma ni rnga yab po //

T02D2503-1:6a-23: dra ba phyed pa ni mchog mtha' na yod pa'o //
T02D2503-1:6a-24: glegs bam la la las ni zla ba zhes smos

T02D2503-1:6a-26: mdor bsdus pas mtshams sbyar bar bya'o //

T02D2503-1:6a-28: de rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa ste dar dang /
T02D2503-1:6a-30: me tog gi phreng ba dang ;

T02D2503-1:6a-37: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2503-1:6a-41: zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:6a-42: de ltar gyur pa gnas gang na bzhugs she na /
T02D2503-1:6a-43: de bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:6a-44: lha rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas na lha'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2503-1:6a-45: 'og min yang yin la lha'i rgyal po yang yin pas na 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po ste /

T02D2503-1:6a-47: pas na 'og min te thams cad kyi thu bor

T02D2503-1:6b-37: bskal ba du mar mang du bslabs pa yi //

T02D2503-1:7a-1: ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang zhes bya ba la

T02D2503-1:7a-29: ba'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir dang /

T02D2503-1:7a-31: dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad de spyod pa'i thugs gang

T02D2503-1:13b-22: bcom ldan 'das de nyid sems can yongs su smin

T02D2503-1:13b-24: cad bsdus pa'i tshul gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i ngo
T02D2503-1:13b-25: bo nyid kyis de la lhag par mos pa'i sems
T02D2503-1:13b-26: can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir de'i gzugs su
T02D2503-1:13b-27: ston pas na dkyil 'khor thams cad dang zhes bya
T02D2503-1:13b-28: ba smos so // tshig gi nyes pa myur ba
T02D2503-1:13b-29: dang bar ma dang thog ma yongs su spangs nas
T02D2503-1:13b-30: mi gsung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis bzlas brjod kyi
T02D2503-1:13b-31: dus su sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na
T02D2503-1:13b-32: de nyid la mi gsung ba zhes kyang bshad do
T02D2503-1:13b-33: ba smos so // // sngags pa bzlas brjod la
T02D2503-1:13b-34: 'jug pa rnams sangs rgyas la mchod pa ma byas
T02D2503-1:13b-35: na dngos grub rnams mngon du 'phags par mi 'gyur
T02D2503-1:13b-36: ba smos so // // te / de bas na
T02D2503-1:13b-37: sna tshogs pa dang yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod
T02D2503-1:13b-38: pa'i tshul thams cad kun du bstan te /
T02D2503-1:13b-39: de bas na thams cad las zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D2503-1:13b-40: de gnyi ga la yang le lo can rnams la mi 'byung ste /
T02D2503-1:13b-41: de bas na brtson 'grus zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2503-1:13b-42: rang bzhin 'jam pa rnams kyis ni ci dang cis
T02D2503-1:13b-43: bsdigs kyang gal te dge ba'i phyogs rnams la bar
T02D2503-1:14a-1: par 'gyur ba srid pas de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2503-1:14a-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gang yang
T02D2503-1:14a-3: rung ba ma tshang bar gyur pas kyang ji skad
T02D2503-1:14a-4: du bshad pa'i don la gal te zhum par 'gyur
T02D2503-1:14a-6: de bas na dam du gzung zhes bya pa smos
T02D2503-1:14a-7: te sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams kyi ngo bo
T02D2503-1:14a-8: nyid du des pa'i sems dpa' yang de nyid yin
T02D2503-1:14a-9: no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:14a-10: bcom ldan 'das de sngags dang sems dpa'i ngo bo
T02D2503-1:14a-11: nyid yin pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi
T02D2503-1:14a-12: phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid du yang bstan par bya
T02D2503-1:14a-13: ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-1:14a-14: smos te / mi phyed cing 'byed par byed pas rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-15: 'dren pa'i don gyis na lcags kyu'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-16: sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'bigs pa'i don gyis na mda'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-17: dga' ba'i don gyis na ma gu ba'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-18: zhen par byed pa'i don gyis na rin po che'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-19: 'od zer gyi snang bas ma rig pa'i mun nag
T02D2503-1:14a-20: gis bsgribs pa rnams la dngos po thams cad ston
T02D2503-1:14a-22: gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:14a-23: sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skye
T02D2503-1:14a-24: bzhin pa 'jig par byed pas na rgyal mtshan no
T02D2503-1:14a-25: // sems can shin tu yid mi bde ba rnams
T02D2503-1:14a-26: kyang chos kyi dga' ba'i ro myang na ngo mtshar
T02D2503-1:14a-27: skyed par byed pas na 'dzum pa'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-28: theg pa chen po'i tshes la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i
T02D2503-1:14a-29: sems can rnams la yang 'jig rten pha rol rnam
T02D2503-1:14a-30: par dag par bya ba'i phyir thabs rnam pa sna
T02D2503-1:14a-31: tshogs kyis 'dul bar mdzad pas na padma'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-32: sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang shes rab
T02D2503-1:14a-33: kyi ral gris tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa la
T02D2503-1:14a-34: rab tu 'jog par mdzad pas na ral gri'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-35: gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'pho bar mdzad pas na 'khor lo'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-36: mngon par 'dod pa'i don gsung pa'i don gyis na gsung ngo //
T02D2503-1:14a-38: byed pa po shin tu 'dod pa'i las so zhes ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-39: yid rdo rjer gyur par byed pas na go cha'o //
T02D2503-1:14a-40: ma rungs pa thams cad la mngon sum du gyur
T02D2503-1:14a-41: pa nyid kyis 'jigs par mdzad pas na 'jigs byed
T02D2503-1:14a-42: do // sku gsung thugs bsdus pas phyag rgya thams
T02D2503-1:14a-43: cad 'dzin pas na bcangs pa ste de nyid ni
T02D2503-1:14b-0: bcom ldan 'das @14b yin no zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:14b-1: gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di ji skad du bshad
T02D2503-1:14b-2: pa'i tshul gyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin
T02D2503-1:14b-3: na de'i thog ma ni gang zhig yin /
T02D2503-1:14b-4: de'i tha ma ni nam zhig yin zhes rnam par rtog pa la /
T02D2503-1:14b-5: de'i phyir thog ma tha ma med ces bya ba smos te thog ma ni dang por skye ba'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-6: tha ma ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba med par 'jig pa'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-7: gang la de dag gnyi ga med pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
T02D2503-1:14b-8: rgyun gyi tshul gyis rtag tu gnas so zhes ston to //
T02D2503-1:14b-9: yongs su ma dag pa'i gnas skabs na yang sems
T02D2503-1:14b-10: can gyi rgyun la thog ma med pa nas thog
T02D2503-1:14b-11: ma med pa'o // yongs su dag pa'i gnas skabs
T02D2503-1:14b-12: na yang gnas yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid rgyu
T02D2503-1:14b-13: mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'khor ba na bzhugs
T02D2503-1:14b-14: pas na tha ma med do //
T02D2503-1:14b-15: gal te 'di 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs na /
T02D2503-1:14b-16: de lta ni ma zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes rtog pa la zhi zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:14b-17: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bas na zhi ba'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-18: gal te zhi ba ma yin na ni zhi ba'i
T02D2503-1:14b-19: gzugs kyis gdug cing gtum pa rnams ji ltar 'dul
T02D2503-1:14b-21: ma rungs zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2503-1:14b-22: 'di skad ston te 'di ni zhi ba yin du
T02D2503-1:14b-23: zin kyang gdul ba'i sems can gyi dbang gis ma
T02D2503-1:14b-24: rungs pa nyid du yang ston pa yin no//
T02D2503-1:14b-25: gal te gzugs ngan pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad smod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2503-1:14b-26: lan du khro ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:14b-27: 'di ni khro ba dang bcas pa'i dpa' bo'i tshul
T02D2503-1:14b-28: nyid gzung gi ma rungs pa gzhan dag la bya
T02D2503-1:14b-30: gal te khro bo nyid yin na de lta na ni /
T02D2503-1:14b-31: bzod pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2503-1:14b-32: de'i lan du bzod pa che zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:14b-33: bzod pa chen po mnga' bas na bzod pa che'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-34: nyon mongs pa rnams zad par mdzad pas na gnod sbyin no //
T02D2503-1:14b-35: srin po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams kyi phyir srin po dam pa zhes smos te /
T02D2503-1:14b-36: srin po bzang po ni srin po dam pa'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-37: de rnams la mi zad pa'i gzugs bstan pas ji ltar 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2503-1:14b-38: de'i lan du bstan zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:14b-39: bstan pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2503-1:14b-40: sems can gang gzi brjid dang ldan pa de rnams
T02D2503-1:14b-41: kyi nang na gzi chen te gzi brjid dang ldan
T02D2503-1:14b-42: pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ston pa yin no
T02D2503-1:15a-1: nga rgyal dang ldan pa de tshar gcod par mdzad pas na dpa' bo'o //
T02D2503-1:15a-3: lha'i khyad par 'ga' zhig bdag po nyid du nye
T02D2503-1:15a-4: bar ston pas bdag nyid rlom sems su byed pa
T02D2503-1:15a-5: de rnams la de gdul bar bya ba'i phyir dpa'
T02D2503-1:15a-6: bo che zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:15a-7: thams cad du ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:15a-8: dbang phyug chen po yang chung ma'i stobs kyis nga
T02D2503-1:15a-9: ni au ma'i bdag po nyid do zhes shin tu
T02D2503-1:15a-10: rlom sems te / de bas na de'i nga rgyal
T02D2503-1:15a-11: bsal ba'i phyir au ma'i bdag po nyid du yang
T02D2503-1:15a-13: de'i phyir au ma'i bdag po zhes smos so //
T02D2503-1:15a-14: las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis so sor rab tu skye bas skye dgu ste /
T02D2503-1:15a-15: de rnams kyi mgon po yin pas na skye dgu'i mgon no //
T02D2503-1:15a-16: de yang skyabs dang mi 'jigs pa stsol ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:15a-17: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pa
T02D2503-1:15a-18: la 'dir dngos po thams cad la 'jug par mdzad
T02D2503-1:15a-19: pa'am / thams cad de la 'jug par mdzad pas
T02D2503-1:15a-20: na gtogs 'dod ces bya ba'am yang na de la
T02D2503-1:15a-21: dad pa rnams la de'i gzugs su ston par mdzad
T02D2503-1:15a-22: pas na gtogs 'dod khyab 'jug ces kyang de nyid
T02D2503-1:15a-23: pa'am / la bya'o // rgyal bas mngon par khengs
T02D2503-1:15a-24: pa rnams la shin tu rgyal bar bzhed cing rgyal
T02D2503-1:15a-25: po'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na rgyal 'dod kyang 'di
T02D2503-1:15a-26: pa'am / la bya'o // nyid do // lus dang
T02D2503-1:15a-27: ngag dang yid thub pa dang ldan pas na thub
T02D2503-1:15a-28: pa'am / la bya'o // nyid do // pa ste
T02D2503-1:15a-29: / de rnams kyi nang na shin tu mchog tu
T02D2503-1:15a-30: gyur pas thub pa che zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:15a-31: 'jig pas na 'jig rten te sems can gyi 'jig rten dang /
T02D2503-1:15a-33: de gnyi ga skyong bar mdzad pas na 'jig rten skyong zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:15a-34: lha ma yin gdug pa rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2503-1:15a-35: sogs pa rnam par 'jig pa las bzlog pa'i phyir
T02D2503-1:15a-36: ro // gal te snod kyi 'jig rten skyong ba
T02D2503-1:15a-37: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe
T02D2503-1:15a-38: ro // na / nam mkha' zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2503-1:15a-39: ril sogs pas bsgribs pa'i phyogs na yang ma bsgribs
T02D2503-1:15a-40: pa nyid du ston pas dngos po gzugs can du
T02D2503-1:15a-42: nam mkha'i phyogs su yang sa'i dkyil 'khor ston pas na sa'o //
T02D2503-1:15a-43: sen mo'i sbubs la sogs par yang 'jig rten gsum
T02D2503-1:15a-44: po ston par mdzad pas na 'jig rten gsum zhes
T02D2503-1:15b-0: bya ba yang de nyid @15b yin te /
T02D2503-1:15b-2: khams gsum pa zhes bya ba yang ba sbu'i khung
T02D2503-1:15b-3: bu re re bzhin yang khams gsum rab tu ston
T02D2503-1:15b-4: par mdzad pa'o // zad par gyi skye mched bsgoms
T02D2503-1:15b-5: pa las 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur
T02D2503-1:15b-6: par ston par mdzad pas na 'byung chen no //
T02D2503-1:15b-7: shin tu yang sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pas na sems can don rab mdzad ces bya'o //
T02D2503-1:15b-8: dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma lus par ston par mdzad pas na thams cad do //
T02D2503-1:15b-9: dgongs pa'i dbang gis des 'dul ba rnams la de'i
T02D2503-1:15b-10: gzugs su'ang ston par mdzad pas na gu lang ste
T02D2503-1:15b-12: tshangs pa ni tshangs pa zhes 'jig rten na grags pa ste /
T02D2503-1:15b-13: des 'dul ba rnams la de'i gzugs su ston par mdzad pas na tshangs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:15b-14: dngos po thams cad 'jug pa'i tshul du bdag nyid ston par mdzad pas na 'khor ba'o //
T02D2503-1:15b-15: de rnams nyid ldog pa'i tshul ston par mdzad pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o ;
T02D2503-1:15b-16: / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis na rtag pa ste /
T02D2503-1:15b-17: don dam par ni de'i ngo bos rtag tu bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:15b-18: spyod pa skyon med par ston par mdzad pas na yang dag 'tsho zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:15b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa nam
T02D2503-1:15b-20: mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par ston par mdzad pa'i
T02D2503-1:15b-21: dus su mchod pa che zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:15b-22: 'di ma h'a'i sgra ni mchod pa yin par bshad
T02D2503-1:15b-23: pas che ba'i mchod pa ni mchod pa chen po'o
T02D2503-1:15b-24: // dngos po thams cad kyi don gyi de kho
T02D2503-1:15b-25: na nyid thugs su chud pas na sangs rgyas so
T02D2503-1:15b-26: // // nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams dang shin tu bral bas na dag pa'o //
T02D2503-1:15b-27: 'dis 'gro ba na theg pa ste byang chub sems
T02D2503-1:15b-28: dpa'i sa bcu rgyud dang 'bras bur bcas pa ni
T02D2503-1:15b-29: bcu gnyis te sa bcu gnyis la theg pa chen
T02D2503-1:15b-30: po zhes bya'o // mos pa spyod pa'i sa rnams ni rgyu yin la /
T02D2503-1:15b-31: sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du bzang po ni 'bras bu yin te /
T02D2503-1:15b-32: 'di thams cad ni theg pa chen po'o //
T02D2503-1:15b-33: 'di'i don ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs la
T02D2503-1:15b-34: yang theg pa chen po'i sgrar bshad de sgra'i don
T02D2503-1:15b-35: gyi gzugs su snang bas na de'i phyir theg pa
T02D2503-1:15b-37: 'dod pa'i srid pa ni 'dod pa'i khams so //
T02D2503-1:15b-38: gzugs kyi srid pa ni gzugs kyi khams so /
T02D2503-1:16a-0: @16a * // gzugs med pa'i srid pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams te /
T02D2503-1:16a-2: srid pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de nyid yin te /
T02D2503-1:16a-3: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid sems dang sems
T02D2503-1:16a-4: byung khams gsum pa zhes dbus dang mtha' rnam par
T02D2503-1:16a-5: 'byed pa las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:16a-6: la lar rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i ngo
T02D2503-1:16a-7: bo nyid du ston par mdzad pas na rtag pa
T02D2503-1:16a-8: yang de yin no zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:16a-9: sa 'og gi 'jig rten dang sa steng gi 'jig rten dang /
T02D2503-1:16a-10: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D2503-1:16a-11: de las rnam par rgyal ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na 'jig rten gsum rgyal te /
T02D2503-1:16a-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs can zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:16a-13: bde ba la spyod par mdzad pas na bde spyod
T02D2503-1:16a-14: de sham zhes bya ba ni bde ba la bya
T02D2503-1:16a-15: bar bshad la / de stsol bas skyong bar mdzad
T02D2503-1:16a-16: pa'i phyir bde spyod de nyid kyi rang bzhin dang
T02D2503-1:16a-17: gzhan rnams skyong bar mdzad pas na bde spyod mgon
T02D2503-1:16a-18: bar bshad la / no // gdul bar dka' ba
T02D2503-1:16a-19: thams cad shin tu yang 'dul bar mdzad pas na
T02D2503-1:16a-21: rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de /
T02D2503-1:16a-22: de rnams kyi gtso bo mdzad pas na rdo rje gtso dang zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:16a-24: sa bzang po ni sa rab mchog ste ye shes
T02D2503-1:16a-25: kyis yongs su bcad pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub
T02D2503-1:16a-27: de dag gi mchog ni kun du bzang po ste /
T02D2503-1:16a-28: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:16a-29: don thams cad phyin ci ma log par yongs su
T02D2503-1:16a-30: gcod pas na de nyid ni yin ye shes so
T02D2503-1:16a-31: // pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sdud pa
T02D2503-1:16a-32: la 'jug pas na pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
T02D2503-1:16a-33: // lo // byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub
T02D2503-1:16a-34: sems dpa' ste sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i sgra ni
T02D2503-1:16a-35: sems yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:16a-36: stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i
T02D2503-1:16a-37: ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na rnam par thar
T02D2503-1:16a-38: zhes bya'o // spyod par spyod pa'i don gyis na spyod pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:16a-39: byang chub 'thob pa'i spyod pa ji skad bstan pa
T02D2503-1:16a-40: bzhin du rjes su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2503-1:16a-41: pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes
T02D2503-1:16a-42: bya ba ni rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:16a-43: cad dang tha mi dad par bzhugs pas na de
T02D2503-1:16b-1: / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni sangs rgyas don no //
T02D2503-1:16b-2: sangs rgyas thugs zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi dgongs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:16b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gsum bsdus pa'i don gyis na byang chub kun no //
T02D2503-1:16b-4: 'di'i gong na yod pa ma yin pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02D2503-1:16b-5: 'og min lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs par bstan
T02D2503-1:16b-6: pa ni rnam par snang mdzad de rnam par snang
T02D2503-1:16b-7: mdzad chen po 'di nyid kyi so sor snang ba
T02D2503-1:16b-9: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dis sdig pa dang
T02D2503-1:16b-10: mi dge ba'i chos rnams las rgyal bar mdzad pas
T02D2503-1:16b-11: na rgyal ba zhes bshad de /
T02D2503-1:16b-12: sdig pa'i chos la nga rgyal bas ;
T02D2503-1:16b-13: / nyer 'gro de phyir nga rgyal ba //
T02D2503-1:16b-14: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:16b-15: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa skyob par mdzad pa'i don gyis na mgon po'o //
T02D2503-1:16b-16: rang byung bas na rang byung ste /
T02D2503-1:16b-17: de nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2503-1:52a-24: zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:52a-25: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams bsdu'o //
T02D2503-1:52a-26: ji tsam gyi bar du mthar thug pa zhe na /
T02D2503-1:52a-27: gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa'i bar du ste /
T02D2503-1:52a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen
T02D2503-1:52a-29: po'i don ston par mdzad pa'i sgra ni gsung ste
T02D2503-1:52a-30: / de'i rjes su 'gro bas na gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab ces bya'o //
T02D2503-1:52a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi khyad
T02D2503-1:52a-33: par gang gis chos ston pa na sgra 'dis don
T02D2503-1:52a-34: 'di lta bu ston pa yin no zhes tshig la
T02D2503-1:52a-35: sogs pa'i don legs par mtshon par byed pa de
T02D2503-1:52a-36: ni gsung gi rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab ces
T02D2503-1:52a-37: bya'o // de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ni /
T02D2503-1:52a-38: rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o //
T02D2503-1:52a-39: de nyid ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
T02D2503-1:52b-1: rdo rje ral gri zhes smos pa ni rang gi gnas pa nyid ston pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:52b-2: rdo rje blo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2503-1:52b-3: don thams cad so sor rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2503-1:52b-4: ni rdo rje lta bu yin te /
T02D2503-1:52b-5: de blo de lta bu yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'i
T02D2503-1:52b-6: blo rdo rje'i blo zhes don dang rjes su mthun
T02D2503-1:52b-7: pa'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ba stsal ba
T02D2503-1:52b-8: yin no // de nas rdo rje'i blos de bzhin
T02D2503-1:52b-9: gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des
T02D2503-1:52b-10: zhes pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ral
T02D2503-1:52b-11: gri des 'debs shing zhes pa rnam par bsgom zhing
T02D2503-1:52b-12: mi snang bar mdzad de ched du brjod pa 'di
T02D2503-1:52b-15: gzugs kyi sku rnam par gzhig pa ni 'debs pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:52b-16: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi blos rdul phran du bshig la /
T02D2503-1:52b-17: rdul phran yang phyogs cha drug gi tshul gyis mi snang bar byas te /
T02D2503-1:52b-18: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro
T02D2503-1:52b-19: bar rab tu bsgom zhing mthar sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D2503-1:52b-20: yang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes
T02D2503-1:52b-21: yongs su gcod pa la ni 'debs zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:52b-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2503-1:52b-24: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D2503-1:52b-25: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:52b-26: 'di ni nges par 'di ltar rtogs par bya'i /
T02D2503-1:52b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par bsgoms nas de
T02D2503-1:52b-29: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku don med par mi 'gyur ro
T02D2503-1:52b-30: // des na dngos po thams cad kyang de bzhin
T02D2503-1:52b-31: gshegs pa'i sku ltar gzugs can yin pas na don
T02D2503-1:52b-33: des na stong pa nyid med pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:52b-34: pa yang de kho na nyid gzigs pa ma yin
T02D2503-1:52b-35: par 'gyur ro // de'i phyir stong pa nyid la
T02D2503-1:52b-36: dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi ral gri des de bzhin
T02D2503-1:52b-37: gshegs pa'i sku rnam par bsgom pa la ni 'debs
T02D2503-1:52b-39: 'di zhes bya ba ni phyag na gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-1:52b-40: de zhes bya ba ni bdag gang las skyes pa'o //
T02D2503-1:52b-42: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D2503-1:52b-44: shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:52b-45: de'i pha rol ni rab kyi mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2503-1:52b-46: shes rab kyi pha rol der ston pa'i shes rab
T02D2503-1:52b-47: gang yin pa de la ni shes rab kyi pha
T02D2503-1:52b-48: rol tu phyin pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:53a-0: de'i tshul ni dngos po thams cad @53a * //
T02D2503-1:53a-1: rnam par gzhig pa bsgom pa de /
T02D2503-1:53a-2: 'di ni ral gri'i phyag rgyas ston to //
T02D2503-1:53a-4: dgra rnams thams cad gcod byed cing //
T02D2503-1:53a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku can la sogs pa'i dngos po
T02D2503-1:53a-7: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D2503-1:53a-8: rnam par bsgoms par gyur nas /
T02D2503-1:53a-9: dmigs par bya ba'i rgyu med de /
T02D2503-1:53a-10: de la dmigs pa las kyang nyon mongs pa mi skye bas gcod byed cing zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:53a-11: skye ba med pa ni gcod pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:53a-12: gang zhig gcod pa yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:53a-13: dgra rnams zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:53a-14: dgra ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams te /
T02D2503-1:53a-15: 'gro ba drug tu sdug bsngal mang po bskyed pa'i don gyis so //
T02D2503-1:53a-16: nyon mongs pa rnam par bcad na des kun nas
T02D2503-1:53a-17: bslang ba'i mi dge ba bcu'i rgyu med pa'i phyir
T02D2503-1:53a-19: sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:53a-20: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsgom pa'i khyad par
T02D2503-1:53a-21: ram mi rtag pa nyid yid la byed pa la
T02D2503-1:53a-22: sogs pa bsgom pa'i khyad par gzhan dag gis kyang
T02D2503-1:53a-24: mi dge ba rnams mi skye ba srid pas de
T02D2503-1:53a-25: las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir mchog ces bya
T02D2503-1:53a-26: ba gsungs so // 'di skad ston te /
T02D2503-1:53a-27: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ral gri las
T02D2503-1:53a-28: gzhan pa dag yid la byed pa ni 'di lta
T02D2503-1:53a-29: bu gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2503-1:53a-30: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2503-1:53a-31: gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab gdul bya
T02D2503-1:53a-32: rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:53a-33: dkyil 'khor 'dir snying po dang phyag rgya dang sems dpa'i gzugs su sprul par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:53a-34: da ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa shes rab kyi
T02D2503-1:53a-35: khyad par thob pas yongs su smin pa rnams la
T02D2503-1:53a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sprul pa bstan par bya
T02D2503-1:53a-37: ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:53a-38: sems bskyed ma thag pa zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D2503-1:53a-39: bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:53a-40: // de ma thag ces bya ba'i sgra ni bar ma chad pa la bya ba yin no //
T02D2503-1:53a-41: chos kyi 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D2503-1:53a-42: de sems bskyed pa tsam gyis bskor ba'i ngang tshul
T02D2503-1:53b-0: 'di la mnga' bas na sems @53b bskyed ma thag
T02D2503-1:53b-1: tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2503-1:53b-2: de'i dam tshig ni snying po dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:53b-3: de chos kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gang las byung
T02D2503-1:53b-4: ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje ltar
T02D2503-1:53b-5: mi byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la don dang
T02D2503-1:53b-6: mthun pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2503-1:53b-7: 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D2503-1:53b-8: ni mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2503-1:53b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs kyi khyad par
T02D2503-1:53b-10: gang dang gang gis 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad pa
T02D2503-1:53b-11: 'di dang 'di 'di ltar gyur cig ces bya ba'i
T02D2503-1:53b-12: thugs la gnas pa'i don de ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:53b-13: pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo zhes bshad de /
T02D2503-1:53b-14: 'khor lo bskyed pa'i phyir dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02D2503-1:53b-15: thugs la gnas pa'i phyir snying po zhes kyang bya la /
T02D2503-1:53b-16: sgra gang gis don de ston par byed pa'i sgra
T02D2503-1:53b-17: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-1:53b-20: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o ;
T02D2503-1:53b-21: / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir badzra he tu zhes gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:53b-22: snying pos bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan
T02D2503-1:53b-23: 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid gang gi don
T02D2503-1:53b-24: du bskul ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2503-1:53b-25: po la sogs pa der gyur te /
T02D2503-1:53b-26: byung nas gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje
T02D2503-1:53b-27: 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te zhes bya ba la
T02D2503-1:53b-28: / 'khor lo lta bu'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:53b-29: sems bskyed ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2503-1:53b-30: sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzugs dang /
T02D2503-1:53b-32: lha rnams kyi rang bzhin sprul par byed pa'i 'khor
T02D2503-1:53b-33: lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang
T02D2503-1:53b-34: ba'i phyir dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gcig tu gyur pa dang /
T02D2503-1:53b-36: rdo rje dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2503-1:53b-37: rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pa las byung bas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhes gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:53b-38: 'khor lo las byung bas na 'khor lo'o //
T02D2503-1:53b-39: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo khyod su zhig gi zhe na /
T02D2503-1:53b-41: rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi //
T02D2503-1:53b-43: rdo rje lta bu'i thugs kyi chos can gang yin
T02D2503-1:53b-44: pa de ni rdo rje dam pa'i chos can te
T02D2503-1:54a-2: ci'i phyir de'i thugs rdo rje lta bu zhe na /
T02D2503-1:54a-4: gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2503-1:54a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur //
T02D2503-1:54a-8: de'i thugs de de ltar shin tu bsgoms pa dang /
T02D2503-1:54a-9: brtan pa nyid kyis phyag rgya'i gzugs sam /
T02D2503-1:54a-11: gzhal yas kyang gi gzugs sam /

T02D2503-1:54a-18: gzhan gang gis kyang sprul pa gzhig par mi nus so //
T02D2503-1:54a-19: rgyu des na de'i thugs ni rdo rje lta bu nyid yin no //

T02D2503-1:54a-22: gis byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma
T02D2503-1:54a-23: thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la /
T02D2503-1:54a-24: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba stsol ba ste /
T02D2503-1:54a-25: de yang rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge
T02D2503-1:54a-26: 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
T02D2503-1:54a-27: par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
T02D2503-1:54a-28: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje'i 'khor lo
T02D2503-1:54a-29: de byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma
T02D2503-1:54a-30: thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag
T02D2503-1:54a-31: tu de bzhin du byin no zhes bya bar sbyar
T02D2503-1:54a-32: ro // lhag ma rnams kyis ni dgos pa ston te /
T02D2503-1:54a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-1:54a-34: rgya'i khyad par gang gis gdul bya'i skye bo rnams
T02D2503-1:54a-35: la phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo lta
T02D2503-1:54a-36: bus dkyil 'khor chen po ston par mdzad pa'i dkyil
T02D2503-1:54a-37: 'khor chen po de la ni dam tshig ces bya'o
T02D2503-1:54a-38: // ci'i phyir 'khor lo de dang dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig byin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:54a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams su sems
T02D2503-1:54a-40: can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'jug pa'i phyir
T02D2503-1:54a-41: ro // ci'i phyir de de rnams 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2503-1:54a-42: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:54a-43: phyir ldog pa ni byang chub kyi lam las ldog pa'o //
T02D2503-1:54b-0: ldog pa des 'jug pas na phyir ldog @54b pa yin la /
T02D2503-1:54b-1: ldog par mi byed pas na phyir mi ldog pa'o //
T02D2503-1:54b-2: phyir mi ldog pa de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D2503-1:54b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ste der 'jug pa'o //
T02D2503-1:54b-4: phyag rgya bzhi'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i slob dpon gyis phyag rgya dang sems dpa' dang /
T02D2503-1:54b-5: sngags rnams ji skad du bshad pa'i bya ba dang
T02D2503-1:54b-6: ldan pa'i phye ma la sogs pas dgod cing bris
T02D2503-1:54b-7: pa la yang sngar bshad pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-1:54b-8: du 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pas phyir mi ldog pa'i
T02D2503-1:54b-10: tshul de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /
T02D2503-1:54b-12: ji skad du bshad pa'i bya ba la yang nan
T02D2503-1:54b-13: tan du 'jug pas gdul bya rnams rim gyis sangs
T02D2503-1:54b-14: rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon sum du
T02D2503-1:54b-16: der zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2503-1:54b-17: thad nas theg pa chen po'i chos shin tu dri
T02D2503-1:54b-18: ma med la / zab cing rgya che ba mngon
T02D2503-1:54b-19: sum du thos pa'i ro myang zhing chos kyi longs
T02D2503-1:54b-20: spyod bla na med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde
T02D2503-1:54b-22: don de dag gi phyir 'khor lo de byin pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:54b-23: gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus su sa dang pha rol
T02D2503-1:54b-24: tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs nas
T02D2503-1:54b-25: go 'phang bla na med pa thob ste /
T02D2503-1:54b-26: ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gtogs
T02D2503-1:54b-27: pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur
T02D2503-1:54b-28: pas na de byin pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:54b-29: de la dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas na dam pa'i chos te /
T02D2503-1:54b-30: dam pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
T02D2503-1:54b-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2503-1:54b-32: de rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ni dam pa'i
T02D2503-1:54b-33: chos ston pa nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi
T02D2503-1:54b-34: sems kyi rgyud la 'jug pas 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D2503-1:54b-35: ba la / de nyid ni grub pa dam pa ste de dag gi phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:54b-36: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2503-1:54b-37: go 'phang bla na med pa thob pa'i rgyur nges
T02D2503-1:54b-38: par rdo rje lta bu'i dam pa'i chos ston pas
T02D2503-1:54b-39: snying por gyur pas na snying po ste /
T02D2503-1:54b-40: mar gyi snying po dang 'dra bas na de'i phyir
T02D2503-1:54b-41: rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje'i snying po zhes ming
T02D2503-1:55a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2503-1:55a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'dir dkyil 'khor bar sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /

T02D2503-1:55a-4: bya ba nyams su lon par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ste /
T02D2503-1:55a-5: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa de'i sgo nas de rnams phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog pas na /
T02D2503-1:55a-6: de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don bla na
T02D2503-1:55a-7: med pa mthong bas yongs su mgu nas ched ka
T02D2503-1:55a-8: gnyis du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
T02D2503-1:55a-9: pa ste / yongs su dga' nas smras pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:55a-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2503-1:55a-11: chos thams cad ni gdul bya'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i dad pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:55a-12: de rnams kyi rnam par sbyong ba ni dri ma med par bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:55a-13: gang gi phyir sngags kyi spyod par bshad pa'i 'khor
T02D2503-1:55a-14: lor 'jug pa'i thabs kyis gdul bya rnams nyid dang
T02D2503-1:55a-15: mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs la gzhol bar 'gyur ro
T02D2503-1:55a-16: // de lta bu'i rnam par dag pa gang dang
T02D2503-1:55a-17: gang rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur
T02D2503-1:55a-18: // te / de bas na chos thams cad rnam par sbyong zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:55a-19: 'khor lo 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:55a-20: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:55a-21: 'dir zhugs pa rnams ni nges par sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur bas na /

T02D2503-1:59b-0: dpa'i @59b spyad pa spyod pa rnams la las thams
T02D2503-1:59b-1: cad ston par mdzad pa'i phyir /

T02D2503-1:59b-5: sems dpa'i ngo por dkyil 'khor du sprul par mdzad
T02D2503-1:59b-6: pa yin pas 'das ma thag pa'i rab tu byed
T02D2503-1:59b-7: pas ni phrin las bstan pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:59b-16: par gang las byung ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i

T02D2503-1:60a-0: @60a * // 'di nyid ni las yin te de la sogs pa'o //

T02D2503-1:60a-3: rnam par shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir gcig pa dang

T02D2503-1:60a-5: mkhregs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2503-1:60a-9: la ni skyes bu dpa'o zhes brjod pa dang 'dra
T02D2503-1:60a-10: bar de'i rang bzhin can gyi go cha'o //
T02D2503-1:60a-11: shin tu brtan pas na rab tu brtan pa'o //

T02D2503-1:60a-18: med par sbyangs pas 'jig rten gsum po rnams kyis

T02D2503-1:94a-41: grogs po dang 'dra bas na grogs po ste /
T02D2503-1:94a-42: bya ba rnams la 'bad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2503-1:94b-26: de nas dril bu de dkrol zhing shes rab kyi

T02D2503-1:94b-29: dril bu de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbyangs ston pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:95a-28: chos kyi phyag rgya yang brjod pa yin te /

T02D2503-1:95a-33: de lta bu'i cho ga rnams kyis bya ba'i tshogs rnams rdzogs par mdzad nas /

T02D2503-1:96a-6: de la phan pa thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //

T02D2503-1:96a-16: par rtog par byed pa bzhin du /

T02D2503-1:99b-30: rgyud thams cad la yang 'dis bsgre bar bya'o //

T02D2503-1:100a-6: de nas lung las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o ;
T02D2503-1:100a-7: / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa

T02D2503-1:100a-18: // de nas sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba ni gsum pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:100a-19: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba ni bzhi pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:100b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2503-1:100b-24: rdo rje'i dbyibs gcig bris nas kyang /

T02D2503-1:100b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2503-1:100b-40: sgom pa pos snying po 'di dag ni bzla bar bya ba yin no //
T02D2503-1:100b-41: rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2503-1:100b-42: 'byor pas na rdzu 'phrul te sems kyi yang dag par 'byor pa'i dbang phyug go //
T02D2503-1:101a-2: de'i phyag rgya ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa

T02D2503-1:101a-4: // de'i ye shes yin pas na rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
T02D2503-1:101a-5: rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni //

T02D2503-1:101a-9: 'dir yang sngar ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du bya ba yin pas /

T02D2503-1:101a-12: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rdo rje phra mo bsgom

T02D2503-1:101a-16: de nas bdag nyid kyis gzugs de ltar bur rang
T02D2503-1:101a-17: nyid kyis kyang mthong zhing gzhan dag la yang ston
T02D2503-1:101a-18: par 'gyur te / de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2503-1:101a-19: du ji srid du bsgom pa de srid du de

T02D2503-1:101a-22: bdag gis bdag nyid nam mkhar ni //
T02D2503-1:101a-23: zhes bya ba la 'di ltar bsgom ste /
T02D2503-1:101a-24: bdag gi lus ji srid cha shas su gyur pa
T02D2503-1:101a-25: de srid kyi bar du rnam par gzhig cing rdul
T02D2503-1:101a-26: phra rab las cha drug tu rnam par brtags pas
T02D2503-1:101a-27: bsgom mo // de nas bdag ni nam mkha'o zhes mi snang bar byas nas /
T02D2503-1:101a-28: de ltar bdag nyid ji srid bsgoms pa de srid kyi bar du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:101a-29: yang na lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2503-1:101a-30: de'i dbus su bdag nyid 'dug par bsam mo //
T02D2503-1:101a-31: de nas rdo rje khu tshur bcings la /
T02D2503-1:101a-32: khu tshur de ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'o zhes bsgoms na /
T02D2503-1:101a-33: ji srid khu tshur ma bshig bde srid kyi bar du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:101a-34: rdo rje dbab pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /

T02D2503-1:101a-36: zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du ji
T02D2503-1:101a-37: skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid yang ba nyid
T02D2503-1:101a-38: du lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:101a-39: rdo rje yin par bdag bsgom nas //

T02D2503-1:101a-41: de nas zla ba bzhi 'am lo gcig gi mthar
T02D2503-1:101a-42: gnas de na 'dug bzhin du sgrub pa'i dus su
T02D2503-1:101b-0: @101b khri'am gtsug lag khang gi steng ngam /
T02D2503-1:101b-1: ri la sogs pa'i steng du 'dug la mtshan thog

T02D2503-1:101b-7: yang na rdo rje'i phyag rgya grub pa'i rig 'dzin yin pas na rdo rje rig 'dzin no //

T02D2503-1:101b-13: las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2503-1:101b-14: gang gis dngos grub phyin ci ma log par 'grub

T02D2503-1:101b-16: 'dzin gyi dngos grub grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
T02D2503-1:101b-17: so // zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni //
T02D2503-1:101b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang su yang

T02D2503-1:101b-23: de'i mtshan ma yang legs par yid la bya'o //
T02D2503-1:101b-24: de nas bya ba thams cad spangs te /

T02D2503-1:101b-26: lus drang por bsrangs nas lce rkan la bcar te /

T02D2503-1:101b-31: ma zad pa de srid sngar bshad pa'i snod kyi

T02D2503-1:101b-39: ji srid du reg pa'i mtshan ma byung gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:101b-40: de nas spro bar byas te /
T02D2503-1:102a-0: de nas khru gang tsam gyi @102a * //

T02D2503-1:102a-3: de nas yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid sor
T02D2503-1:102a-4: gcig tsam gyi tshad dus bzhin sa 'phags pa bsgom
T02D2503-1:102a-5: par bya'o // de nas sor gnyis dang sor gsum
T02D2503-1:102a-6: dang sor bzhi dang sor bzhi dang sor brgyad dang
T02D2503-1:102a-7: par bya'o // / de nas khru gang tsam du rim gyis bsgom zhing /
T02D2503-1:102a-8: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:102a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms la /
T02D2503-1:102a-10: lag na rdo rje la sogs pa phyag rgya yod par rab tu bsgom zhing /

T02D2503-1:102a-18: rten dbang phyug sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i don

T02D2503-1:102a-22: to // // de yang rdo rje yang yin la
T02D2503-1:102a-23: thams cad kyang yin pas rdo rje thams cad do
T02D2503-1:102a-24: to // // // de 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2503-1:102a-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las so //

T02D2503-1:102a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzung ngo //
T02D2503-1:102a-28: de rnams dang 'brel pa'i dngos grub dam pa gang yin pa de grub pa ni thob pa'o //
T02D2503-1:102a-29: de'i phyag rgya ni bzhi ste de'i ye shes so //
T02D2503-1:102a-30: de lta bu'i phyag rgya gang yin pa bsgoms pas 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:102a-31: dngos grub de dag ni go bzlog pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /

T02D2503-1:102a-33: rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2503-1:102a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2503-1:102a-37: nam mkha'i khams su zhes bya ba 'dis ni spro ba ston to //
T02D2503-1:102b-0: @102b yang dag par bsam pas na bsam pa ste /
T02D2503-1:102b-1: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyang bsams la /

T02D2503-1:102b-5: ji srid 'dod pa de srid kyi bar du lding bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2503-1:102b-7: kun las dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don dam pa'i chos yin la /

T02D2503-1:102b-9: kun las dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bshad do //

T02D2503-1:102b-25: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:102b-27: thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2503-1:102b-29: dngos po 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /

T02D2503-1:109a-10: gang phyag rgya rgyas par sgrub par 'dod pa des
T02D2503-1:109a-11: ji skad du bshad pa'i sangs rgyas rang gi snying
T02D2503-1:109a-13: gang gi phyir dang po'i rnal 'byor la ni zla
T02D2503-1:109a-14: ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i byang chub kyi
T02D2503-1:109a-15: sems yin par gsungs pa dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-16: de la ni ye shes kyi rdo rje ste /
T02D2503-1:109a-17: de nas sems dpa'i nga rgyal bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-18: der yang sangs rgyas rnams gzhug pa dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-19: de la sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-20: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya las sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'o//
T02D2503-1:109a-21: ji ltar na phyag rgya las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung zhe na /
T02D2503-1:109a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de nyid kyang gcig tu gyur nas /
T02D2503-1:109a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs su 'gyur te /
T02D2503-1:109a-24: de ltar sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya dang po bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:109a-25: de las sngags pa gang rgyas par sgrub par 'dod
T02D2503-1:109a-26: pa des badzra bandha trata ces bya ba brjod la
T02D2503-1:109a-27: / de'i 'og tu rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya zhing /
T02D2503-1:109a-28: rang gi snying po yang brjod do //
T02D2503-1:109a-29: de nyid kyi tshe yid kyis bdag nyid rnam par
T02D2503-1:109a-30: bsgom zhing sems tsam nyid du gzhag par bya ste
T02D2503-1:109a-31: // der zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du lhag par mos par bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-32: de la ye shes kyi rdo rje bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-33: de la yang nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-34: der yang ji skad du bshad pa'i sangs rgyas gzhug pa dang /
T02D2503-1:109a-35: sangs rgyas de rnams kyang sems dpa'i gzugs su yongs su gyur par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:109a-36: de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2503-1:109a-37: sangs rgyas gzhug pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhin
T02D2503-1:109a-38: du bya ba 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa yin
T02D2503-1:109a-39: no // 'dir yang gal te 'dod na zla ba'i
T02D2503-1:109a-40: dkyil 'khor la rdo rje dgod pa la sogs pa
T02D2503-1:109a-41: no // bzhin du / lcags kyu dgod pa la sogs pa yang bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:109b-0: de nas lcags @109b kyu la sogs pa la nga rgyal bskyed pa dang /
T02D2503-1:109b-1: de nas sangs rgyas bcug ste /
T02D2503-1:109b-2: rang gi sems dpar lhag par mos par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:109b-3: de lta na yang 'gal ba med do //
T02D2503-1:109b-4: yang na rdo rje nyid las rang gi sems dpar
T02D2503-1:109b-5: mos par bya ba de lta bu yang nyes pa
T02D2503-1:109b-6: med do // de nas de'i 'og tu dam tshig
T02D2503-1:109b-7: gi phyag rgya bcings la khyod ni bdag go zhes
T02D2503-1:109b-8: med do // mos par bya'o // gal te rgyas
T02D2503-1:109b-9: par byed par mi 'dod na rdo rje nyid las
T02D2503-1:109b-11: rang gi sems dpar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:109b-12: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:109b-13: de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2503-1:109b-14: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi sems dpa' bsam par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:109b-15: de nas dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya ste /
T02D2503-1:109b-16: 'dir yang mdor bsdus pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:109b-17: sgrub pa chen po la yang phyogs gnyis te /
T02D2503-1:109b-18: dang por sangs rgyas gzhug pa ma byas par phyag
T02D2503-1:109b-19: rgya chen po bskyed la byin gyis brlab pa la
T02D2503-1:109b-20: sogs pa byas nas phyis rang gi sems dpa' gzhug
T02D2503-1:109b-21: pa'i tshe / rang gi sems dpa' ma bcug pa
T02D2503-1:109b-22: nyid du ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis phyag
T02D2503-1:109b-23: rgya thams cad byin gyis rlob par mdzad pas sangs
T02D2503-1:109b-25: de bas na sangs rgyas tshad med pa bcug pa'i phyir sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:109b-26: 'di ni rtog pa thams cad dang rgyud thams cad
T02D2503-1:109b-27: la yang phyag rgya chen por sgrub pa'i cho gar
T02D2503-1:109b-29: gang yang sngar sgrub pa bshad par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i sgrub pa de ni 'di yin no //
T02D2503-1:109b-30: dngos grub dang zhes gang gsungs pa ni gang phyag rgya rdzogs pa de ni dngos grub yin no //
T02D2503-1:109b-31: grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams //
T02D2503-1:109b-32: zhes gang dam bca' ba mdzad pa de ni de nas /
T02D2503-1:109b-33: bla na med pa'i rdo rje las //
T02D2503-1:109b-34: de dag gi ni las bshad de //
T02D2503-1:109b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02D2503-1:109b-36: rdo rje'i las zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rnams kyi las yin pa'am /
T02D2503-1:109b-37: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ji skad gsungs pa'i las yin pa'am /
T02D2503-1:109b-38: yang na rdo rje dbyings las gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i las //
T02D2503-1:109b-39: las de ni thun mong du gyur pa'i bla na
T02D2503-1:109b-40: yod pa dang bcas pa'i las kyang gal te kha
T02D2503-1:109b-41: cig tu 'byung srid pas de'i phyir bla na med
T02D2503-1:110a-1: gi ni zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i 'o //
T02D2503-1:110a-2: las zhes bya ba ni gang gang gi rang gi 'bras bu ni de dang de'i las so //
T02D2503-1:110a-3: las de gang yin zhes dres pa las /
T02D2503-1:110a-4: bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa de
T02D2503-1:110a-5: lta bur mdzad pa'i tshul gyis dang po sang rgyas
T02D2503-1:110a-6: kyi phyag rgya chen po'i las ston pas na /
T02D2503-1:110a-7: de'i phyir de'i las dang po bstan pa ni /
T02D2503-1:110a-8: sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na //
T02D2503-1:110a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:110a-10: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags
T02D2503-1:110a-11: dang bcas pa spangs shing gnas yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D2503-1:110a-12: mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen
T02D2503-1:110a-13: po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing /
T02D2503-1:110a-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yang dag par brgyan
T02D2503-1:110a-15: pa 'od 'dom gang ba kun du 'bar bar byed
T02D2503-1:110a-16: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid
T02D2503-1:110a-17: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdzogs par byas
T02D2503-1:110a-18: nas / der rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2503-1:110a-19: de'i yon tan rjes su dran pa ste /
T02D2503-1:110a-20: yang dang yang du gcig tu byas nas mang por byed pa dang /
T02D2503-1:110a-21: mang por byas nas gcig tu byed pa dang /
T02D2503-1:110a-22: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su byas nas sems dpa'i gzugs su byed pa dang /
T02D2503-1:110a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su byas nas slar yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su byed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:110a-24: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams
T02D2503-1:110a-25: du mra rjes su dran pa'i sang rgyas rjes su
T02D2503-1:110a-26: dran pa'o // des yang dag par grub cing rdzogs pa ni /
T02D2503-1:110a-27: sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na //
T02D2503-1:110a-29: bya ba 'di'i 'bras bu 'di yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:110a-30: sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:110a-32: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po 'di'i las ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2503-1:110a-33: myur du sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par byed pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:110a-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan kyi rdo rje sems ma la
T02D2503-1:110a-35: sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi ni 'khor nyid du bstan
T02D2503-1:110a-36: pa yin la de bas na 'di rnams kyi phyag
T02D2503-1:110a-37: rgya chen po'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2503-1:110a-38: rigs kyi yum yin pas gtso bor gyur pa yin la /
T02D2503-1:110a-39: gtso bor gyur pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i 'og tu de'i las ston te /
T02D2503-1:110a-40: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02D2503-1:110b-1: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-2: de bas na sems dpa' dang rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-3: de yang dag par grub na /
T02D2503-1:110b-4: phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:110b-6: phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag por gyur cing /
T02D2503-1:110b-7: dbang byed par gyur pas phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2503-1:110b-8: rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:110b-9: rin po che nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-10: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis phyag rgya nga yin pa de ni /
T02D2503-1:110b-11: rin chen rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:110b-12: rin chen rdo rje ma yod pa'am /
T02D2503-1:110b-13: yang na rgyur gyur pa yang dag par grub par
T02D2503-1:110b-14: gyur pa des na rin chen kun dbang 'gyur zhes
T02D2503-1:110b-15: bya ba / rin po che'i rigs thams cad kyi
T02D2503-1:110b-16: dbang por 'gyur zhing bdag por gyur pas na rin
T02D2503-1:110b-17: chen kun dbang 'gyur zhes bya ste /
T02D2503-1:110b-18: rdo rje rin chen du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:110b-19: chos kyi rigs kyi rdo rje ma yin pas na chos kyi rdo rje ma'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-20: chos kyi bsam pa nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-21: de ston pa'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rdo rje ma zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:110b-22: grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste bsam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-24: chos kyi rdo rje mas so //
T02D2503-1:110b-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ma yin pas na sangs rgyas chos /
T02D2503-1:110b-29: 'jig rten dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:110b-30: dge ba'i sems la las zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad de /
T02D2503-1:110b-31: de ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-32: de nges par ston pa'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'o//
T02D2503-1:110b-34: rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:110b-36: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2503-1:110b-37: du thogs pa med par las byed par 'gyur zhes
T02D2503-1:110b-39: sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-43: mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2503-1:110b-44: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'o //
T02D2503-1:110b-45: rdo rje 'dren pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2503-1:111a-0: de'i cho ga ni de'i phyag rgya rdzogs par byas @111a * //
T02D2503-1:111a-2: rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcings //
T02D2503-1:111a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2503-1:111a-6: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi chags pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de ni rgyu med par yang
T02D2503-1:111a-8: sems can rnams smin pa dang grol ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2503-1:111a-9: can gyis chags pas sems can rnams la chags pa
T02D2503-1:111a-10: yin la / de ni sems can rnams kyi log
T02D2503-1:111a-11: par sgrub pa mang pos kyang dbye bar mi nus
T02D2503-1:111a-12: yin la / pas na / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du bshad de /
T02D2503-1:111a-13: rdo rje chags pa de'i phyag rgya chen po yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:111a-14: rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya che //
T02D2503-1:111a-16: des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mnyes par byed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-17: dgyes par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:111a-18: sangs rgyas rgyas thams cad du gtogs pa ni rdo rje legs pa ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-19: 'di nyid kyi rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs so//
T02D2503-1:111a-20: des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2503-1:111a-22: su zhig dgyes par byed ce na /
T02D2503-1:111a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-24: de dag dang sems can gzhan rnams kyang dga' bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2503-1:111a-25: rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis //
T02D2503-1:111a-26: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i phyag rgya 'chang bas na rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-27: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:111a-28: des ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2503-1:111a-29: sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed //
T02D2503-1:111a-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur ba yin pas na sangs rgyas dbang bskur te /
T02D2503-1:111a-33: rdo rje gzi brjid cho gas ni //
T02D2503-1:111a-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so //
T02D2503-1:111a-36: rdo rje gzi brjid mur du 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:111a-38: rdo rje gzi brjid ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D2503-1:111a-39: de ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi gzi brjid
T02D2503-1:111a-40: mnga' bas na rdo rje gzi brjid ces bya ste
T02D2503-1:111a-41: / de gzhan gyis mi bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:111a-42: rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba la dpal ni mtshan ma la bya ste /
T02D2503-1:111a-43: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal ni rdo rje'i dpal lo //
T02D2503-1:111a-44: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje dpal 'dzin no //
T02D2503-1:111a-45: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de bsten pa ste sgom par byed pa'o //
T02D2503-1:111b-0: re ba rnams ni yongs su @111b bskang //
T02D2503-1:111b-1: zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:111b-2: yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:111b-3: rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i so'i phreng
T02D2503-1:111b-4: ba gnyis kyis bzhad par ston par na rdo rje
T02D2503-1:111b-5: bzhad pa ste / de'i cho ga ni phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa ste /
T02D2503-1:111b-6: de'i sbyor ba byas pas so //
T02D2503-1:111b-7: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad //
T02D2503-1:111b-8: ces bya ba sangs rgyas kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2503-1:111b-9: de dag gi bzhad pa ni sems can rnams kyi
T02D2503-1:111b-10: don mdzad pa'i phyir cung zad 'dzum pa yin la
T02D2503-1:111b-11: / 'di'ang de rnams dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par 'gro
T02D2503-1:111b-12: ba'i don mdzad pa'i rgyur cung cad 'dzum par byed
T02D2503-1:111b-14: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen cing /
T02D2503-1:111b-15: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
T02D2503-1:111b-16: 'dzum pa yang dag par bstan pas sems can rnams
T02D2503-1:111b-17: chos zhu ba la 'dzud cing dam pa'i chos ston
T02D2503-1:111b-18: pas don mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:111b-19: de bzhin du sngags pa de yang rdo rje bzhad
T02D2503-1:111b-20: pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas sems can thams
T02D2503-1:111b-22: de lta bas na de dang de bzhad pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:111b-23: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi chos mnga' bas na
T02D2503-1:111b-24: rdo rje chos de chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
T02D2503-1:111b-26: de gang gis kyang gzhig par mi nus pas na rdo rje'i sgrar gsungs la /
T02D2503-1:111b-27: chos de gtso bor byas pas tshogs yongs su rdzogs
T02D2503-1:111b-28: par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la yang
T02D2503-1:111b-29: rdo rje chos zhes bya ste spyan ras gzigs kyi
T02D2503-1:111b-30: dbang po'o // de'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan
T02D2503-1:111b-31: pas na sngags pa 'di yang rdo rje chos 'dzin
T02D2503-1:111b-32: dbang po'o // par 'gyur ro // rdo rje rnon po ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2503-1:111b-33: de'i cho ga yis te de'i phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:111b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog / ces bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:111b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2503-1:111b-37: shes rab ces bya ba chos rab tu rnam par
T02D2503-1:111b-39: shes rab des mchog tu gyur pas na shes rab mchog tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-1:112a-2: de 'chang zhing 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2503-1:112a-3: de bsten pa ni de'i phyag rgya chen po bsgoms
T02D2503-1:112a-4: na sngags pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur
T02D2503-1:112a-5: te / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
T02D2503-1:112a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de bzhin du /
T02D2503-1:112a-7: sngags pa des kyang de'i phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na /
T02D2503-1:112a-8: de bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:112a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo ni sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:112a-10: rdo rje gsung pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje smra ba ste /

T02D2503-1:120b-42: byed pa 'di ni de'i las yin no //
T02D2503-1:120b-43: pha l'a ga mi zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di
T02D2503-1:120b-44: ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me tog ma'i chos
T02D2503-1:121a-2: sngags bas de brjod na yid la mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2503-1:121a-4: su te dza gri zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di
T02D2503-1:121a-5: ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mar me ma'i chos
T02D2503-1:121a-6: kyi phyag rgya'o // sngags pas de brjod na gzi
T02D2503-1:121a-7: brjid chen po thob par byed pa 'di ni de'i
T02D2503-1:121a-8: kyi phyag rgya'o // las yin no // su gandham
T02D2503-1:121a-9: gi zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di ni rdo rje
T02D2503-1:121a-10: byug pa ma'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:121a-11: sngags pas de brjod na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2503-1:121a-12: kyi tshul khrims kyi dri lus la 'thob par 'gyur
T02D2503-1:121a-13: te / 'di ni de'i las yin no //
T02D2503-1:121a-14: aa ya hi dza:zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di ni
T02D2503-1:121a-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lcags kyu'i chos kyi phyag
T02D2503-1:121a-16: rgya'o // yang dag par 'gugs par byed pa ni de'i las yin no //
T02D2503-1:121a-17: aa y'a h'i h'um h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs
T02D2503-1:121a-18: 'di ni rdo rje zhags pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2503-1:121a-19: ste / lhag ma ni de'i las yin no //
T02D2503-1:121a-20: he spo ta bam zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di
T02D2503-1:121a-21: ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2503-1:121a-22: ste / lhag ma ni las yin no //
T02D2503-1:121a-23: ghanda aa:a'a zhes bya ba'i sgra'i gzugs 'di ni rdo rje dril bu'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:121a-24: rab bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni de'i las yin no //
T02D2503-1:121a-25: chos kyi phyag rgya dang de ngag gi las rnams bshad zin to //
T02D2503-1:121a-26: da ni sgrub pa bshad dgos pas de'i phyir de
T02D2503-1:121a-27: nas de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa
T02D2503-1:121a-28: dge ba bshad ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:121a-29: 'dis sgrub pas na sgrub pa ste /
T02D2503-1:121a-30: nges pa'i sbyor ba gang gis rang gis las sgrub pa de la sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:121a-31: sbyor ba de yang gang yin zhe na //
T02D2503-1:121a-33: lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms nas //
T02D2503-1:121a-35: chos kyi phyag rgya brjod pa'i tshe lce rdo rje
T02D2503-1:121a-36: zhes bya ba rtse lnga pa dge ba zhes bya
T02D2503-1:121a-37: ba dkar po bsgom pa ste dgod par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:121a-38: de'i 'og tu chos kyi phyag rgya brjod par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:121a-39: de nas 'di'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:121a-40: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02D2503-1:121a-41: da ni las kyi phyag rgya brjod dgos te /
T02D2503-1:121a-42: de bas na de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad de zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:121a-43: las rab tu ston pa'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:121a-44: gang gis bcings pas rgyud las gsungs pa'i las rnams
T02D2503-1:121a-45: grub par byed pa de rnams la ni las kyi
T02D2503-1:121b-1: de rnams bcings ba ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ba'o //
T02D2503-1:121b-2: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02D2503-1:121b-3: zhes bya ba la rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtshan nyid ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2503-1:121b-4: de dam du bcings pa ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par byas pa'o //
T02D2503-1:121b-5: mnyam par gzhag pas zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang gi ltar bdag nyid mngon sum du byas nas /
T02D2503-1:121b-6: gdod las rnams gyis shig ces ston pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:121b-7: gnyis su zhes bya ba ni bcing ba de so sor dbral bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:121b-8: rdo rje khur tshur lag pa gnyis su phral na rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis su 'gyur te /

T02D2503-1:121b-10: de la re zhig thog mar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya ston te /

T02D2503-1:121b-15: g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so //
T02D2503-1:121b-16: ci bkug pa nyid la gzung ngam zhe na /
T02D2503-1:121b-18: bsgreng bar bya ba zhes gsungs te /

T02D2503-1:121b-20: byang chub ni rtogs pa ste /

T02D2503-1:121b-35: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2503-1:121b-36: g-yon pa snga ma bzhin du skyil mi krung gi

T02D2503-1:121b-39: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bye brag tu dbye ba'i don to //

T02D2503-1:122a-36: rdo rje khu tshur g-yas pa'i snying gnas sor brgyad
T02D2503-1:122a-37: pa tsam gyi thad kar mdun du gzhag pa la

T02D2503-1:122b-0: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar bzhag @122b la se gol gnyis gtogs par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:122b-1: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bzhag la /

T02D2503-1:122b-21: ni rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:122b-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag ngar gnyis gcig
T02D2503-1:122b-23: tu sbyar la mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar mdun du
T02D2503-1:122b-24: bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:122b-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kha nas gyen du drang ba 'di ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:122b-26: rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pa mdun du bkan te bzhag la /

T02D2503-1:122b-28: g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa nas dgrol te sgeg pas yongs su bskor la /
T02D2503-1:122b-29: mkhur tshos g-yon pa'i thad du drang /

T02D2503-1:122b-31: de nas bskor ba gsum pa byed cing spyi bor

T02D2503-1:123b-20: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyems te mnan //

T02D2503-1:123b-38: zhes pa ste de dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:123b-39: sbyor ba de gang yin zhe na /

T02D2503-1:123b-42: zhes byas ba ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi

T02D2503-1:124a-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2503-1:124a-4: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya

T02D2503-1:124a-10: de'i las dang po kho nar ye shes kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //

T02D2503-1:124a-14: rim gyis 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don

T02D2503-1:124a-19: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis sngags pa'i yid
T02D2503-1:124a-20: mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:124a-21: // rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2503-1:124a-22: zhes bya ba ni dad pa la sogs pa'i yon
T02D2503-1:124a-23: tan gyi rin po che rnams 'di las byung bas

T02D2503-1:124a-30: gzhan rnams rjes su 'dzin par nus pas na gzhan la phan par byed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:124a-31: gzhan gyi don byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:124a-32: de yod pas na gzhan la phan byed ldan te der 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-1:124a-33: dam pa rnams kyi chos yin pas dam pa'i chos te /
T02D2503-1:124a-34: de gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la 'jug par byed pa'i don gyis na 'khor lo zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:124a-38: dam pa'i chos ston pas sems can rnams la phan
T02D2503-1:124a-39: 'dogs nas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:124a-40: // mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i mchog yin pas na mi 'jigs mchog ste /
T02D2503-1:124b-0: bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pa'i @124b phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-1: sngags pas de bcings myur bar ni //
T02D2503-1:124b-2: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2503-1:124b-4: myur du 'jigs pa sel nus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2503-1:124b-7: rdo rje 'gying ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //

T02D2503-1:124b-9: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //

T02D2503-1:124b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:124b-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2503-1:124b-14: 'gugs zhes bya ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-15: rdo rje mda' yis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-16: de'i sbyor bas ni rdo rje'i lha mo'ang zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:124b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:124b-18: de yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-19: bdag nyid byed ces bya ba ni sngags pa'o //

T02D2503-1:124b-22: rgyal ba kun zhes bya ba ste de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:124b-23: pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig

T02D2503-1:124b-26: de bcings na ston pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:124b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D2503-1:124b-28: de zhes bya ba ni sngags pa'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-29: dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba byin
T02D2503-1:124b-30: pas mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:124b-31: // rdo rje nyi ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzi brjid kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-32: de bcings na sngags pa de nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:124b-33: rdo rje rgyal mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpal gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-34: bsgreng bas zhes bya bas ni de bcings pas so //
T02D2503-1:124b-35: de ni zhes bya ba ni sngags pa'o //
T02D2503-1:124b-36: rin chen char yang 'bebs zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D2503-1:124b-37: can thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi
T02D2503-1:124b-38: dngos grub ste / de 'bebs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:124b-39: rdo rje 'dzum pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:125a-0: @125a * // bcings pas zhes bya ba ni bcings pa byas pa'o //

T02D2503-1:125a-5: du sngags pa des phyag rgya bcings pas 'dzum pa'i

T02D2503-1:125a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni //

T02D2503-1:125b-0: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las kyi @125b phyag rgya'o //

T02D2503-1:125b-5: rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing //
T02D2503-1:125b-6: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi las

T02D2503-1:125b-26: du me tog gi phreng ba 'dogs pas na rgyan
T02D2503-1:125b-27: gyi dam pa ni me tog gi phreng ba yin

T02D2503-1:126a-7: phyir / de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi //

T02D2503-1:126a-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /

T02D2503-1:126a-17: spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bcings pa'i thabs mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:126a-19: thun mong gi bcings ba'i thabs te /

T02D2503-1:126a-21: de la thog ma nyid du zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-1:126a-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba yin du

T02D2503-1:126a-26: na phyis gdod sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyar
T02D2503-1:126a-27: 'gyur te / dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni
T02D2503-1:126a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas na zhes gsungs

T02D2503-1:126b-27: sems dpa' dbab pa ni ma yin no //
