T02D2503-1:129b-19: de ltar ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:129b-21: yang na nga'i ston pa'i cos ni 'di yin no zhes ston par byed cing /
T02D2503-1:129b-22: chos rku bar byed pa de la ni de la
T02D2503-1:129b-23: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa zhes
T02D2503-1:129b-24: bya ba de yang shin tu sdig pa chen po
T02D2503-1:129b-26: de rnams kyis kyang snying po 'di brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:129b-27: sems can gang dam pa'i chos la smod pa de yang sdig pa chen po byed pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:129b-28: mdo sde la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas
T02D2503-1:129b-29: gsungs pa rnams la yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma
T02D2503-1:129b-31: yang na ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin
T02D2503-1:129b-32: no zhes zer pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos la
T02D2503-1:129b-34: de bas na dam pa'i chos la smod par byed
T02D2503-1:129b-35: pa de rnams kyang snying po bzlas pas 'grub par
T02D2503-1:129b-36: 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:129b-37: kha na ma tho ba re re tsam zhig byed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T02D2503-1:129b-38: nyes pa thams cad byas pa yang snying po 'di brjod na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2503-1:129b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa por 'gyur ba ston pa'o //
T02D2503-1:129b-40: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas zhes gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:130a-2: bskul ba'i snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bskul bar gyur na /
T02D2503-1:130a-3: brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar
T02D2503-1:130a-4: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar dga' bar ro
T02D2503-1:130a-5: // dngos grub thams cad dam zhes bya ba ni thun mong gi'o //
T02D2503-1:130a-6: dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni khyad par ston te /
T02D2503-1:130a-7: khyad par de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:130a-9: dris pa sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub ni dngos grub kyi dam par gsungs na /
T02D2503-1:130a-10: rdo rje'i dngos grub ci'i phyir dngos grub kyi dam par gsungs she na /
T02D2503-1:130a-11: gang gi phyir stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo
T02D2503-1:130a-12: rje las sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub
T02D2503-1:130a-14: de bas na rdo rje'i dngos grub kyang dngos grub
T02D2503-1:130a-15: kyi dam par gsungs pa la nyes pa med do
T02D2503-1:130a-16: // rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub kyi dam pa nyid yin no //
T02D2503-1:130a-17: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma rnams kyi dngos grub sdud do //
T02D2503-1:130a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems
T02D2503-1:130a-19: dpas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:130a-20: cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /

T02D2503-1:130a-22: 'di dag kyang yang dag par sdud par byed pa'i tshig yin no //
T02D2503-1:130a-23: phyag rgya rnams kyi bcing ba yang bshad zin to //
T02D2503-1:130a-26: brtan par bya ba yang bshad zin na /
T02D2503-1:130a-27: ldang ba'i tshe phyag rgya rnams bkrol nas ldang bar bya dgos na ji ltar dgrol bar bya ba'am /
T02D2503-1:130a-28: gang du dgrol bar bya ba ma bshad pas de'i
T02D2503-1:130a-29: phyir de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i
T02D2503-1:130a-30: cho ga rgyas par bshad do zhes gsungs pa yin
T02D2503-1:130a-31: te / de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2503-1:130a-32: phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2503-1:130a-33: phyi'i zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'i 'o //
T02D2503-1:130a-34: dgrol ba'i cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni bcing ba gzhig pa'i thabs kyi bye brag go //
T02D2503-1:130a-35: dgrol ba'i cho ga rgyas pa de yang rnam pa mang bas na /
T02D2503-1:130a-36: de'i phyir de'i nges pa'i dmigs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:130a-37: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:130a-38: thog ma nyid du zhes bya ba ni dang po
T02D2503-1:130b-0: kho nar dgrol ba nyid @130b bshad par bya'o zhes
T02D2503-1:130b-1: bya ste / de bya ba gzhan gyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-2: thog ma nyid du zhes bya ba'i nyid kyi sgra ni dgrol ba kho na dang sbyar ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-3: phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas 'byung ba
T02D2503-1:130b-4: zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang las byung ba
T02D2503-1:130b-5: ma bstan du zin kyang ra ba tu byed pa'i
T02D2503-1:130b-6: don gyi dbang gis rig par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:130b-7: de la re zhig phyag rgya thams cad kyi gzhi ni phyag rgya chen po yin la /
T02D2503-1:130b-8: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi ni rdo rje bcing ba yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-9: rdo rje bcing ba'i ni rdo rje thal mo yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-10: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ni dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-12: chos kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi ni lce yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-13: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi ni snying ga yin no //
T02D2503-1:130b-14: de lta bas na ldang ba'i tshe yang re zhig
T02D2503-1:130b-15: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni khu tshur gnyis su
T02D2503-1:130b-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ni dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur du'o /
T02D2503-1:130b-18: de bas na dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad ni rdo rje bcing bar ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-19: rdo rje bcing ba ni rdo rje thal mor ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-20: rdo rje thal mo ni phyag rgya chen por ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-21: chos kyi phyag rgya rnams ni lce ru'o //
T02D2503-1:130b-22: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rjer ro //
T02D2503-1:130b-23: rdo rje ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2503-1:130b-24: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D2503-1:130b-25: rang bzhin rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi snying gar
T02D2503-1:130b-26: bkrol lo // der rdzogs nas brtul ba'i tshul ji ltar ba de bzhin du /
T02D2503-1:130b-27: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs
T02D2503-1:130b-28: pa'i phyag rgya bzhin bcing ba la yang brtag par
T02D2503-1:130b-29: bya ste / gang dang gang las byung ba de
T02D2503-1:130b-30: dang der yid kyis nye bar bsdus la de nas
T02D2503-1:130b-31: rim gyis ji skad gsungs pa'i snying pos snying gal
T02D2503-1:130b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2503-1:130b-35: rdo rje'i rigs la ni badzra mu:zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2503-1:130b-36: padma'i rigs la ni padma'i ming smos pas so //
T02D2503-1:130b-37: rin po che'i rigs la ni rin po che'i ming smos pas so //
T02D2503-1:130b-38: rtog pa thams cad la yang dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-1:130b-39: rgya gnas de dang de dag tu dgrol zhing snying
T02D2503-1:130b-40: po smras ma thag pa rnams kyis phyag rgya thams
T02D2503-1:131a-0: de nas snying gnas byung ba zhes bya @131a * //
T02D2503-1:131a-1: pa la sogs pa'i gzhung ni go sla bsams bshad do //
T02D2503-1:131a-3: rtog pa gang dang gang la rin chen rdo rje
T02D2503-1:131a-4: ma'i phyag rgya ji lta ji ltar byung ba de
T02D2503-1:131a-5: dang des de dang der phyag rgya dang sngags 'di
T02D2503-1:131a-6: nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:131a-7: de nas yang go cha'i mthar zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-1:131a-8: go cha'i mtha' mar phreng ba bcing ba gang yin
T02D2503-1:131a-9: pa de ni go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba
T02D2503-1:131a-10: zhes bya ste / de btang la thal mo mnyam par brdabs te /
T02D2503-1:131a-11: mnyes par byas zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis
T02D2503-1:131a-12: mnyam par byas la snying ga'i phyogs su thal mo
T02D2503-1:131a-13: dal bus lan gsum brdab par bya ba 'di ni

T02D2503-1:131a-15: snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:131a-16: cho ga 'dis zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste /
T02D2503-1:131a-17: ji skad du bshad pa'i gnas rnams su dgrol ba'i cho gas so //
T02D2503-1:131a-18: de la rin chen rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas rang
T02D2503-1:131a-19: gi lus la bdag por gzhag cing go cha'i mtha'
T02D2503-1:131a-20: mar phreng ba bcing bas bcings te /
T02D2503-1:131a-21: brtan por byas la thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par byas na rdo rje lta bur 'gyur bas ste /
T02D2503-1:131a-22: nam yang yongs su mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:131a-23: ji cho ga 'di nyid kyis rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ram /
T02D2503-1:131a-24: 'on te dus 'di'i tshe cho ga gzhan yang yod ce na /
T02D2503-1:131a-25: de'i phyir yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:131a-26: yi ge brgya pas kyang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:131a-28: gnas ji ltar bar phyag rgya rnams bkrol la /

T02D2503-1:131a-30: go cha'i mthar phreng ba ma byas su zin kyang
T02D2503-1:131a-31: yi ge brgya ba brjod cing mnyam pa'i thal mos
T02D2503-1:131a-32: mnyes par byas te langs na de lta bus kyang
T02D2503-1:131a-34: phyag rgya bzhi rgyas pa dang bcas par smras zin nas /
T02D2503-1:131a-35: phyag rgya la gnas pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga bshad dgos pas /
T02D2503-1:131a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas //
T02D2503-1:131a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bzlas pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02D2503-1:131a-39: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dkyil 'khor gyi bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sems dpa' ste /
T02D2503-1:131a-40: de'i sngags ni 'di nyid yin la /
T02D2503-1:131b-0: de bas na 'di'i don bsgoms nas lan @131b cig brjod pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:131b-1: ji ltar bzla bar bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:131b-2: bzlas pa'i cho ga ni ji ltar 'dod par zhes bya ba ste ci dga' bar ro //
T02D2503-1:131b-4: 'dug gam nyal lam 'greng ngam snyes kyang rung //
T02D2503-1:131b-5: spyod pa ci dgas gang ci 'ang rung ba ru //
T02D2503-1:131b-6: byang chub sems bskyed bzlas pa byas pa yi //
T02D2503-1:131b-7: mkhas pas the tshom med par dngos grub thob //
T02D2503-1:131b-8: ces ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:131b-9: bdag bde bar zhes bya ba ni sems bde ba la bya ste /
T02D2503-1:131b-10: sems bde ba rnams ni rtse gcig par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:131b-12: bde ba'i bdag nyid can gang yin pa de ni bde ba ste /
T02D2503-1:131b-13: bdag ces bya ba ning rgyal gyi gzhi yin pas sems la bya'o //
T02D2503-1:131b-14: bde ba ni bde pa'i tshor ba ste /
T02D2503-1:131b-15: bde ba dang ldan pa'i sems so //

T02D2503-1:131b-17: dka' thub dka' spyad mi bzad pas //
T02D2503-1:131b-18: lus skams 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal te //
T02D2503-1:131b-19: sdug bsngal bas ni sems g-yengs la //
T02D2503-1:131b-20: sems g-yengs dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:131b-21: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:131b-22: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
T02D2503-1:131b-23: / ji ltar na bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ce na /
T02D2503-1:131b-25: lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin //
T02D2503-1:131b-27: bzhin zhes bya ba ni rgyud de dang de dag
T02D2503-1:131b-28: gi nang nas ma bsgrubs par yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2503-1:131b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bsgom zhing /
T02D2503-1:131b-30: 'di lta bu'i bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang 'grub par
T02D2503-1:131b-31: 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2503-1:131b-33: 'di nyid kyang su zhig gis gsungs she na /
T02D2503-1:131b-34: bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:131b-35: bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa'o //

T02D2503-1:131b-37: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2503-1:131b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:131b-39: rdo rje sems dpa' dang por byas pa'i sems dpa'
T02D2503-1:132a-0: gang yin pa rnams ni rdo rje sems @132a *
T02D2503-1:132a-2: de skad smos su zin kyang de rnams kyi sngags
T02D2503-1:132a-3: dang snying po rnams kyang yin par rig par bya
T02D2503-1:132a-4: ste / tha mi dad pas nye bar gdags pas bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:132a-5: ci dga' bar bzlas pa'i yul gang yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:132a-7: sgrub pa dang ni las kun la //
T02D2503-1:132a-9: don gyi dngos sgrub la sogs pa la /
T02D2503-1:132a-10: ci dgar zhes bya ba ste ci 'dod par ro //
T02D2503-1:132a-11: yang na lan cig bzlas pa ste /
T02D2503-1:132a-12: dgos pa kha cig tu rdo rje sems dpa' lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes gsungs pas /
T02D2503-1:132a-15: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02D2503-1:132a-17: stong rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-1:132a-18: rnal 'byor la ni bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:132a-19: dus ji srid kyis phyag rgya bsgoms pa brtan por
T02D2503-1:132a-20: gyur pa de srid du bzlas shing phyag rgya'i sbyor

T02D2503-1:132a-23: snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga bshad zin nas /

T02D2503-1:132a-25: de ni snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
T02D2503-1:132a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //

T02D2503-1:132a-28: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mngon par 'dus byas pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis so //
T02D2503-1:132a-29: sbyor ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i khyad par de
T02D2503-1:132a-30: yang kha cig tu rtog pa las gsungs pa yang
T02D2503-1:132a-31: yod / la lar ni rang gis byas ba yang yod de /
T02D2503-1:132a-32: ji ltar rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir lan gsum khrus bya ba dang /
T02D2503-1:132a-33: gos gsum brje ba la sogs pa gsungs su zin kyang /
T02D2503-1:132a-34: kha cig cho ga de nyid kyis sems rtse gcig
T02D2503-1:132a-35: par 'gyur na de'i cho ga yang de nyid yin
T02D2503-1:132a-36: no // kha cig ni de med pa nyid kyis te /
T02D2503-1:132a-37: khrus kyi cho ga'i rtsom pa byas pa lus mi bde bar gyur na /
T02D2503-1:132a-38: de'i cho ga ni rtog pa las gsungs pa nyid yin no //
T02D2503-1:132a-39: de lta bas na gang la ji lta bu'i cho
T02D2503-1:132a-40: ga'i tshogs bsgrubs shing khrus dang kha zas la sogs
T02D2503-1:132a-41: pas sems rtse gcig tu gyur na de'i sgrub pa'i
T02D2503-1:132a-42: cho ga ni de nyid yin te /

T02D2503-1:132b-8: nges pa ni bzlas pa nyid tshe ma nges par
T02D2503-1:132b-9: ma zad kyi sgrub pa rtog pa la mos pa

T02D2503-1:132b-12: bzlas pa'i chog dang sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad zin nas /

T02D2503-1:132b-14: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

T02D2503-1:132b-20: de'i gsang ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi don yang dag par sdud pa'o //
T02D2503-1:132b-21: de brjod pa ni de smra ba'o //

T02D2503-1:132b-24: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
T02D2503-1:132b-25: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams ni bdug

T02D2503-1:132b-27: pa yin gyi / sgeg mo la sogs pa ni

T02D2503-1:165a-16: ni 'byor ba yod na phyi'i me tog la sogs
T02D2503-1:165a-17: 'chad par bya'o // pas mchod pa'am / bsgom pa
T02D2503-1:165a-18: goms par gyur na yid kyi mchod pa rnam pa
T02D2503-1:165a-19: sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i ngos dang phyogs
T02D2503-1:165a-20: 'chad par bya'o // pas mchod pa'am / dang yul dang / grong dang /
T02D2503-1:165a-21: gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang la sogs par ci nus su gang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2503-1:165a-22: de ltar dam tshig byin nas gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:165a-23: de nas phyag rgya ji ltar bris pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02D2503-1:165a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du rim gyis bstan par bya ba dang /

T02D2503-1:165a-26: de nas thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:165a-27: thams cad ces smos pas ni las kyi dkyil 'khor bya ste /
T02D2503-1:165a-28: de'i mtshan ma ni las kyi rdo rje kha bzhi
T02D2503-1:165a-29: pa yin pas de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2503-1:165a-31: dbang bskur ba'i phan yon bstan pa ni de nas
T02D2503-1:165a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par

T02D2503-1:165a-35: mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug nyin re zhing byed na /

T02D2503-1:165a-37: gzhan thams cad kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-1:165a-38: mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin
T02D2503-1:165a-39: re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces ni gsungs
T02D2503-1:165a-40: na / gang gis ja ltar bya ba mi shes

T02D2503-1:165b-0: de nas byang chub chen po'i sems bsgrub pa'i @165b
T02D2503-1:165b-1: mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes
T02D2503-1:165b-2: bya ba la / byang chub chen po zhes bya
T02D2503-1:165b-3: ba'i chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D2503-1:165b-4: kyi byang chub la ltos pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:165b-5: de'i sems yin pas na byang chub chen po'i sems te /
T02D2503-1:165b-6: de bsgrub pa ni mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-7: de'i phyag rgya ste de'i ye shes bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-8: de ji ltar bslab par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:165b-10: byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas //
T02D2503-1:165b-11: bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing //
T02D2503-1:165b-13: byang chub la sems dpas na byang chub sems so //

T02D2503-1:165b-16: nyid lag mthil na gnas pa tsam du sems shing
T02D2503-1:165b-17: / bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid yin no //
T02D2503-1:165b-19: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa de nyid las sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
T02D2503-1:165b-20: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas bdag ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-21: ci zhig byas pas she na /
T02D2503-1:165b-22: dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed na //
T02D2503-1:165b-24: dga' ba ni yid dga' ba'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-26: byang chub kyi sems de nyid la'o //

T02D2503-1:165b-28: mchod pa des bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur zhen /
T02D2503-1:165b-29: sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob //
T02D2503-1:165b-32: bdag nyid sangs rgyas su bsgoms na /
T02D2503-1:165b-33: rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-34: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:165b-35: da ni rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas kyi mchod pa ston te /
T02D2503-1:165b-36: byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas //
T02D2503-1:165b-37: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2503-1:165b-38: bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing //
T02D2503-1:165b-39: zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2503-1:165b-40: phreng ba la sogs zhes bya ba la /

T02D2503-1:165b-42: sogs pa zhes smos pas ni gdu bu dang dpung rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams bsdu'o //
T02D2503-1:165b-43: rab mchod pas zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i mchog
T02D2503-1:165b-44: dang ldan pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pas so
T02D2503-1:165b-45: // mchod na zhes bya ba ni yang dag par mchod na de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'o//

T02D2503-1:166a-3: byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas //
T02D2503-1:166a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2503-1:166a-5: snyan pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas //
T02D2503-1:166a-7: glu las bde ba 'byung ba ni snyan pa'i glu ste /
T02D2503-1:166a-8: glus tshigs su bcad pa 'don pas dam pa'i chos
T02D2503-1:166a-9: smra ba las yid bde ba gang zhig skye ba

T02D2503-1:166a-13: la sogs pa la yang dga' ba zhig yin na
T02D2503-1:166a-14: / des sha da ba la sogs pa'i glu blangs
T02D2503-1:166a-15: pa las gang yid bde ba skye ba de yang
T02D2503-1:166a-17: snyan pa'i glu'i rnam pa des bdag mchod pa ste /
T02D2503-1:166a-18: bdag ces bya ba ni rang gi sems so //
T02D2503-1:166a-19: de ni mgu bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D2503-1:166a-20: can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'khor bar dga' bar
T02D2503-1:166a-21: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:166a-22: byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas //
T02D2503-1:166a-23: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems brtan pa nyid du bskyed pa ste /
T02D2503-1:166a-24: skye ba gzhan rnams su gnas gzhan gyis bskal du zin kyang /
T02D2503-1:166a-26: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems brtan pa bskyed nas /
T02D2503-1:166a-27: bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing //
T02D2503-1:166a-29: rgyu ma tshang ba med pa yang dag par yod cing 'bras bu la the tshom mi za bas /
T02D2503-1:166a-30: sangs rgyas ni bdag nyid yin par nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02D2503-1:166a-31: gar la sogs pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur na /

T02D2503-1:166a-33: gar la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams smin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:166a-34: gar byed cing des bdag nyid la mchod la /
T02D2503-1:166a-35: gar las byung ba'i yid bde bas mchod cing /
T02D2503-1:166a-36: bdag ces bya ba rang gi sems ba de bar gyur na /
T02D2503-1:166a-37: sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:166a-38: zhes byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa dang
T02D2503-1:166a-39: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs nyams
T02D2503-1:166a-40: su len pa yin pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2503-1:166a-42: ci nas kyang byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2503-1:166a-44: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2503-1:166b-0: sems @166b can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
T02D2503-1:166b-1: 'khor bar yongs su gtong bar mi bye pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:166b-2: da ni byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pas
T02D2503-1:166b-3: tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i thabs su gyur
T02D2503-1:166b-5: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2503-1:166b-6: ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2503-1:166b-7: pas bstan to // sangs rgyas kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02D2503-1:166b-8: de'i mchod pa dang de'i phyag rgya dang de'i ye
T02D2503-1:166b-9: shes yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag
T02D2503-1:166b-11: de bslab par bya'o zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:166b-12: lus dang ngag dang sems ni lus dang ngag dang sems so //

T02D2503-1:166b-22: sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che //

T02D2503-1:166b-27: de ltar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi

T02D2503-1:166b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che //
T02D2503-1:166b-35: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams de gang las skyes she na /
T02D2503-1:166b-36: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje skyes //
T02D2503-1:166b-38: sku'i rdo rje las skyes pa dang /
T02D2503-1:166b-39: gsung gi rdo rje las skyes pa dang /
T02D2503-1:167a-0: thugs kyi rdo rje las skyes pa'i bsod nams @167a * //

T02D2503-1:167a-4: // dris pas rjes su yi rang ba ji ltar na mchod par 'gyur //

T02D2503-1:167a-9: khyad par las bsod nams tshad med par skye bar
T02D2503-1:167a-10: 'gyur ro // bsod nams tshad med pa skyes pas tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

T02D2503-1:167a-13: de'i phyir rjes su yi rang bas mchod na zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:167a-14: rjes su yi rang ba'i mchod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:167a-15: myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2503-1:167a-16: ba ni myur zhing mgyogs pa nyid du sangs rgyas

T02D2503-1:167a-19: bdag nyid dbul bas na bdag dbul ba'o //
T02D2503-1:167a-20: ji ltar bdag dbul bar bya zhe na /

T02D2503-1:167a-23: / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na

T02D2503-1:167b-19: na des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa

T02D2503-1:167b-25: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2503-1:167b-26: chos kyi rigs kyi sgo nas chos kyi mchod pa

T02D2503-1:167b-28: bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi mchod pa byas
T02D2503-1:167b-29: ston te / pa yin no // de yang //
T02D2503-1:167b-30: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal //
T02D2503-1:167b-31: zhes bya ba la chos ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos te /

T02D2503-1:167b-33: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhes bya ba ni ngo

T02D2503-1:168a-5: de ltar rdo rje chos kyi gnas kyi mchod pa bstan nas /

T02D2503-1:168a-9: chos rnams kun ni bsdus pa yi //

T02D2503-1:168a-25: chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:168a-26: don dam par na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2503-1:168a-27: 'das pa'i chos thams cad ma skyes par 'dus pa

T02D2503-1:168a-30: sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya ba ni 'gro ba drug gi 'khor lor nges pa rnams te /
T02D2503-1:168a-31: de'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa ni gang gis
T02D2503-1:168a-32: chos kyi mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2503-1:168a-35: 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi //

T02D2503-1:168a-37: 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D2503-1:168a-38: zhes bya ba ni lud dang rtogs pa'i chos rnams so //
T02D2503-1:168a-39: rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste //

T02D2503-1:168b-0: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rgyu ni @168b de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes bshad do //

T02D2503-1:168b-3: chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:168b-5: chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis //

T02D2503-1:168b-7: sgra brnyan ni brag ca ste /

T02D2503-1:168b-9: rjes kho na la rkyen des de dang mthun pa'i
T02D2503-1:168b-10: sgra grags pa gang yin pa de ni sgra brnyan
T02D2503-1:168b-11: zhes bya'o // de yang tshig gi don med do //
T02D2503-1:168b-12: de lta bu'i sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i chos gang
T02D2503-1:168b-13: yin pa de rnams ni sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D2503-1:168b-15: de ltar de kho na nyid du na chos thams
T02D2503-1:168b-16: cad rang bzhin gyis tshig gi don dang bral ba'o

T02D2503-1:168b-30: gi don dang bral bas na spros pa med pa

T02D2503-1:168b-33: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa nyid mchod pa'i phyag rgya

T02D2503-1:168b-36: 'dzin bsgom pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes te
T02D2503-1:168b-37: rgya'o // / de bslab par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-1:168b-38: lus dang ngag dang sems yin pas lus dang ngag sems so //

T02D2503-1:169a-0: la rang gi rdul phra rab rnams bsam @169a *

T02D2503-1:169a-14: rdo rje'i bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i sku ste /

T02D2503-1:169a-22: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi //

T02D2503-1:169a-26: lus dang ngag dang sems de rnams la rang gi

T02D2503-1:179b-5: 'chi ba ni dus su 'chi ba yin na /
T02D2503-1:179b-6: dus ma yin par 'chi bas na dus ma yin par shi ba ste /
T02D2503-1:179b-7: bar ma dor 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:179b-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni mna' bsgag pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2503-1:179b-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa ste /
T02D2503-1:179b-10: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na sgrub pa ste /

T02D2503-1:179b-15: zhes bya ba ni zla ba yang yin la rgyas pa yang yin pas na zla rgyas so //
T02D2503-1:179b-16: zla ba rgyas pa de'i dkyil 'khor yin pas na zla rgyas dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2503-1:179b-17: de la 'dug pas na zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste'o //
T02D2503-1:179b-18: phyag rgya chen po gzung bas na //
T02D2503-1:179b-19: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung ba'o //
T02D2503-1:179b-20: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni /

T02D2503-1:179b-22: phyag rgya chen po goms par byas na myur ba
T02D2503-1:179b-23: nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don

T02D2503-1:179b-25: sogs pas ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2503-1:179b-26: kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ston
T02D2503-1:179b-27: to // to // 'dod chags bral ba zhes bya
T02D2503-1:179b-28: ba ni 'dod chags bral ba'i sgo nas nyan thos

T02D2503-1:179b-37: rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa ni bla na med
T02D2503-1:179b-38: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i
T02D2503-1:179b-39: skal ba can du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:179b-41: 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu //
T02D2503-1:179b-42: khams gsum na yang gzhan med de //
T02D2503-1:179b-43: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:179b-46: de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar //
T02D2503-1:180a-1: kyis kyang ni ma byed cig / ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /

T02D2503-1:180a-4: de bas na byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i
T02D2503-1:180a-5: ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa

T02D2503-1:180a-8: de la lhag par mos pa yang 'dod chags dang
T02D2503-1:180a-9: bral ba la mos pa yin pas 'dod chags dang

T02D2503-1:180a-12: de na 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'khor lo bcom pa byas pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:180a-14: mna' yi snying po brjod par bya //
T02D2503-1:180a-15: zhes bya ba ni khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma bstan cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:180a-16: de ltar zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyag rgya
T02D2503-1:180a-17: gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bya ba ji lta ba

T02D2503-1:180a-21: byang chub kyi sems yongs su spangs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2503-1:180a-22: 'dod chags dang bral ba lta bu'i sdig pa gzhan

T02D2503-1:180a-27: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2503-1:180a-29: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bslab par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-1:180a-30: dngos grub kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-1:180a-31: phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag gi dngos grub rdo
T02D2503-1:180a-32: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du ji skad gsungs pa
T02D2503-1:180a-33: 'dir yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes ston
T02D2503-1:180a-34: to // dkyil 'khor 'dir dngos grub ji ltar bstan
T02D2503-1:180a-35: pa de bzhin du ras dang rtsig pa la sogs
T02D2503-1:180a-36: pa la dkyil 'khor bris pa'i dngos grub rnams la
T02D2503-1:180a-38: sku gzugs thams cad ces bya ba ni gser dang
T02D2503-1:180a-39: dngul las byas pa nas rdo dang shing la sogs

T02D2503-1:180a-42: gis rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba de dang /
T02D2503-1:180a-43: de nyid ni de'i cho ga yin te /
T02D2503-1:180a-44: ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga des yid la 'dod
T02D2503-1:180a-45: pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba ni
T02D2503-1:180b-0: ji skad gsungs pa'i dngos @180b grub ni dngos grub
T02D2503-1:180b-1: thams cad de / don gyi dngos grub dang /
T02D2503-1:180b-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D2503-1:180b-4: dngos grub dam pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2503-1:180b-5: dngos grub rnams ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:180b-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga
T02D2503-1:180b-7: rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba ste
T02D2503-1:180b-8: / ji ltar zhugs pa rnams mgu bar byas nas
T02D2503-1:180b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya ba ltag ma

T02D2503-1:180b-11: sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'du ba dang /
T02D2503-1:180b-12: byin gyis brlab pa ma mdzad nas /
T02D2503-1:180b-13: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rtog pa bshad pa'i phyir gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:180b-14: da ni gsungs pa'i rtog pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung yin par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:180b-15: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ston te /
T02D2503-1:180b-16: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba dang /
T02D2503-1:180b-17: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad pa ni legs so //
T02D2503-1:180b-18: bya ba'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir te /
T02D2503-1:180b-19: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni skal pa phun
T02D2503-1:180b-20: sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das
T02D2503-1:180b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por gyur
T02D2503-1:180b-23: pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso

T02D2503-1:180b-25: byang chub chen po la sems dpas na byang chub kyi sems chen po ste /
T02D2503-1:180b-26: byang chub kyi sems chen po de la'o //
T02D2503-1:180b-27: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2503-1:180b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' de la'o //
T02D2503-1:180b-29: phyag na rdo rje chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzad po ste /
T02D2503-1:180b-30: phyag na rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang
T02D2503-1:180b-31: yin pas na phyag na rdo rje chen po ste

T02D2503-1:180b-41: pa'o // rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste //
T02D2503-1:180b-42: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chos kyi gzugs kyis
T02D2503-1:180b-43: dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa de yang legs so pa'o

T02D2503-1:181a-0: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las kyi gzugs kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa de yang @181a * //

T02D2503-1:181a-25: theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i //

T02D2503-1:181a-27: chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu mos pas
T02D2503-1:181a-28: spyod pa'i sa dang bcas pa dang bcu gcig go
T02D2503-1:181a-29: // yang na bgrod par bya ba yin pas na theg pa ste /
T02D2503-1:181a-30: sangs rgyas kyis kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2503-1:181a-31: chen po rnams kyi theg pa yin pas na theg pa chen po ste /
T02D2503-1:181a-32: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung la yang theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:181a-33: 'di ni theg pa chen po de'i mngon sum du

T02D2503-1:181a-36: bsdus pa ni mdor bsdus pa'o //

T02D2503-1:181b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i @181b mtshan gang yin ba de dag pa ste /
T02D2503-1:181b-1: bsam pa rnam par dag pas de sgrub par byed na /

T02D2503-1:181b-10: khyod kyis bstan la mkhas pa dga' //
T02D2503-1:181b-12: rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni //

T02D2503-1:181b-16: pa'i tshul gyis 'dod chags rang bzhin gyis rnam par
T02D2503-1:181b-17: dag pa la gzigs pa nyid do //

T02D2503-1:181b-22: kha nam thob med pa'i bde ba mi dge ba
T02D2503-1:181b-23: bcu'i las kyi lam las byung ba ma yin pa
T02D2503-1:181b-24: bde ba des bde ba bsgrubs pa ni ting nge

T02D2503-1:181b-31: g-yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:181b-34: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba des //
T02D2503-1:181b-36: bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:181b-38: mi zad pa dang mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'o //
T02D2503-1:181b-40: byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2503-1:181b-41: sdom pa mnos nas bslab pa lnga dang ldan la
T02D2503-1:181b-42: / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las byung

T02D2503-1:181b-54: rgyal po shin tu ltan sdug par gyur pa na

T02D2503-1:182a-3: shes kyi tshogs 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2503-1:182a-5: de skad du bstod pa byed pa la la dag gis //

T02D2503-1:182a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kho na nyid

T02D2503-1:182a-20: yin pas na rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ste

T02D2503-1:223b-2: par 'du bya ba'i 'bad pa chen pos ril mo'i
T02D2503-1:223b-3: sgra bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na sil snyan
T02D2503-1:223b-4: rnams te / de'i mchod pa yin pas na sil snyan gyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-5: de la de dag gi snying po ni te zhes bya ba ni ru dung gi rol mo ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-6: rdo rje bdug pa ma'i gnas su'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-7: tam ta zhes bya ba ni ba ta ha'i rol mo ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-8: rdo rje me tog ma'i gnas su'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-9: dha dhu zhes bya ba ni ti mi la'i rol mo ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-10: rdo rje mar me ma'i gnas su'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-11: do dha zhes bya ba ni da ka'i rol mo ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-12: rdo rje dbyug pa ma'i gnas su gzhag go //
T02D2503-1:223b-13: sil snyan dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i snying por gsungs
T02D2503-1:223b-14: pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sil
T02D2503-1:223b-15: snyan dang / rol mo de rnams la mngon par bzlas la las de dang de dag bya'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-16: de ltar dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2503-1:223b-17: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2503-1:223b-18: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:223b-19: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
T02D2503-1:223b-20: 'dir zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-21: 'jug pa'i cho ga nyid yin pas na 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-22: rgyas pa ni yan lag dang bcas pa ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-23: mna'i snying po sbyin pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-24: de la zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la'o //
T02D2503-1:223b-25: thog ma zhes bya ba ni dang po kho nar ro //
T02D2503-1:223b-26: nyid du zhes bya ba ni zhugs pa'i rjes thogs
T02D2503-1:223b-27: kho na la gar gyi mchod pa bya'o zhes ston
T02D2503-1:223b-28: to // re zhig ces bya ba'i sgra ni go rims la bya ste /
T02D2503-1:223b-29: gar gyi mchod pa byas pa'i rjes la bya ba
T02D2503-1:223b-30: gzhan dag 'byung ngo zhes bya bar re zhig ces
T02D2503-1:223b-32: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i chogs slob ma bcug la /
T02D2503-1:223b-33: slob dpon gyi gar gyi mchod pa bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2503-1:223b-34: gar gyi mchod pa gang gis bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:223b-35: rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2503-1:223b-38: ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:223b-39: rdo rje rigs ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:224a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' ni dam tshig gi sems dpa'o zhes @224a * //
T02D2503-1:224a-2: de bas na de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-1:224a-3: rgya la ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya'o
T02D2503-1:224a-4: // dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi lan du 'ching bas na lan gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2503-1:224a-5: rin po che'i rigs la bya bar gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:224a-6: 'di dag kyang gleng bslang ba tsam du zad de ;
T02D2503-1:224a-7: slob dpon gyis dang por rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-8: de'i 'og tu chos kyi ris su nye bar song ste /
T02D2503-1:224a-9: rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i phyag rgyal rab tu
T02D2503-1:224a-10: sbyor bas na nye ba'i phyag rgya zhes bshad do
T02D2503-1:224a-11: // ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las /
T02D2503-1:224a-12: las yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya gang yin pa
T02D2503-1:224a-13: de ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad de
T02D2503-1:224a-14: / las kyi rigs yin par gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:224a-16: slob dpon gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-17: slob ma mkhas par gyur bas ma bstan pa nyid
T02D2503-1:224a-18: du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i lan du rdo
T02D2503-1:224a-19: rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:224a-20: yang slob dpon gyis phyag rgya des rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bkrol la /
T02D2503-1:224a-21: rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2503-1:224a-22: slob mas kyang rdo rje kyang rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya de mthong ba dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-23: yang phyag rgya'i lan du rdo rje gzi brdzid kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2503-1:224a-24: de nas slob dpon lan gyi phyag rgya des rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya bkrol la /
T02D2503-1:224a-25: rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2503-1:224a-26: slob mas kyang rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya de mthong ba dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-27: de'i lan gyi phyag rgyar rdo rje dpal gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2503-1:224a-29: rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2503-1:224a-30: slob mas kyang rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya mthong ba dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-31: de'i lan gyi phyag rgyar rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:224a-32: de nas slob dpon nye bar song ste chos kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02D2503-1:224a-33: de nas slob ma yang nye bar song ste /
T02D2503-1:224a-34: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo /
T02D2503-1:224a-35: de ltar rim pa 'dis phyag rgya dang /
T02D2503-1:224a-38: ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:224a-39: 'di su zhig gis mchod par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2503-1:224a-40: rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2503-1:224a-41: phyir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i don du'o //
T02D2503-1:224b-0: gar gyi @224b mchod pa bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2503-1:224b-1: mchod pa ni lha bshos te /
T02D2503-1:224b-2: gar gyis bshos bya ba ni gar gyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-1:224b-4: gar bya ba bstan nas mchod pa bya ba'o /
T02D2503-1:224b-5: rdo rje 'chang pa mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod
T02D2503-1:224b-6: par bya'o zhes ni gsungs na de ji ltar bya
T02D2503-1:224b-7: ba mi shes pas de'i phyir gar dang /
T02D2503-1:224b-10: ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2503-1:224b-11: ye shes ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2503-1:224b-13: gar rnams kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yang ci 'dra ba mi shes pa nas /
T02D2503-1:224b-14: ye shes khi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2503-1:224b-15: yi shes ji lta bu yin pa yang mi shes
T02D2503-1:224b-16: pas da de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:224b-17: de la dang po nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:224b-18: de la zhes bya ba la ni gar gyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la'o //
T02D2503-1:224b-19: dang po nyid du zhes bya ba ni thog ma kho nar ro //
T02D2503-1:224b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bsdus pa ste /
T02D2503-1:224b-21: mdor bsdus pa'i snying po ni rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying po ste /
T02D2503-1:224b-22: snying po de dang rdo rje glu len zhing zhes
T02D2503-1:224b-23: pa rdo rje ye shes las gang byung ba'i glu
T02D2503-1:224b-24: de ni rdo rje glu ste des snying po glur
T02D2503-1:224b-25: blang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-1:224b-26: de rnams la glu des bstod pa sa mchod pa byas nas so //
T02D2503-1:224b-28: rdo rje slob dpon gyis so //
T02D2503-1:224b-30: de'i phyir rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya drag tu gtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:224b-31: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya ji ltar gtogs par bya zhe na /

T02D2503-1:224b-33: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo lcags
T02D2503-1:224b-34: kyur byas pas gung mo la drag tu gtogs par

T02D2503-1:224b-36: ji snyed zhugs pa'i rnams zhes bya ba gang dang zhugs pa'i rnams so /
T02D2503-1:224b-37: phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par 'bebs so zhes
T02D2503-1:224b-38: bya ba ni gang gi me tog gang la babs
T02D2503-1:224b-39: par gyur pa de ni de'i lha ste /
T02D2503-1:224b-40: de phyag rgya bcings pa dang lhan cig 'bab par

T02D2503-1:225a-1: zhes sngar ji skad smras pa de yang slob ma dang bcas pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:225a-2: de yang babs pa yin no zhes ston pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:225a-3: de bas na de rnams kyi dbab pa'i cho ga bshad pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:225a-5: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2503-1:225a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gar gyi mchod pa ston te /
T02D2503-1:225a-7: rdo rje gar gyi tshul ni smras zin mod kyi /
T02D2503-1:225a-8: khro bo'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje gar bya ba ste /
T02D2503-1:225a-9: khyad par ni de tsam du zad do //
T02D2503-1:225a-10: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya snying gar bcings la /
T02D2503-1:225a-11: rdo rje 'chang ba mchod par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje gar gyi tshul de bzhin du byas la /
T02D2503-1:225a-12: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya lcags kyur byas
T02D2503-1:225a-13: te sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang zhing rdo rje
T02D2503-1:225a-15: de bzhin du gar gyi cho gas rdo rje mda' 'phang bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:225a-16: de la rdo rje mda' 'phang ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2503-1:225a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya g-yon logs su bzung la /
T02D2503-1:225a-18: g-yas kyi mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon gyi mdzub mo bzung ste /
T02D2503-1:225a-19: mda' gzhu 'dren pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2503-1:225a-20: de lta bu'i rdo rje mda' 'phen pas /
T02D2503-1:225a-21: rdo rje dga' ba'ang bsgrub par bya //
T02D2503-1:225a-22: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du gar gyi sbyor ba byas na /
T02D2503-1:225a-23: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2503-1:225a-24: legs so zhes bya ba gnyis sbyin pa 'di ni rdo rje dga' ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2503-1:225a-25: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul dang /
T02D2503-1:225a-26: phyag rgya dang pos dam tshig gi sbyin pa'i mchod pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2503-1:225a-28: gsum pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /

T02D2503-1:225a-31: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2503-1:225a-33: sems dpa' thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhi pa bya'o /
T02D2503-1:225a-34: de nas snying gar phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bkrol
T02D2503-1:225a-35: te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag
T02D2503-1:225a-36: rgya'i snying po gang gis dgrol bar bya ba ji
T02D2503-1:225a-37: lta ba bzhin du bkrol la /
T02D2503-1:225a-38: thal mo mi drag pa gsum brdab par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:225a-39: de bas na ji skad smras pa'i tshul du bcing ba dang /
T02D2503-1:225a-41: mnyes par byas bas sngags pa de brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:225a-43: thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya /
T02D2503-1:225b-0: thal mo dal gyis brdab pa gsum @225b byas la
T02D2503-1:225b-1: phyag rgya brtan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:225b-2: // mchod pa'i chog zhes pa ni mchod pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2503-1:225b-3: 'di yis zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa la snyegs te /
T02D2503-1:225b-4: des bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya rdo rje mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:225b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2503-1:225b-6: sems dpa' thams cad la dam tshig sbyin pa dang /
T02D2503-1:225b-8: mnyes par byas pa'i rnam pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par gyur nas de ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2503-1:225b-9: de'i phyir dgos pa thams cad ni //
T02D2503-1:225b-12: de nas gar gyi mchod pa bstan nas da ni
T02D2503-1:225b-13: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la sogs pas gar
T02D2503-1:225b-15: de'i rjes thogs la lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa bya'o zhes bshad na /
T02D2503-1:225b-16: de yang ji ltar bya ba mi shes te /
T02D2503-1:225b-17: de bas na de bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gang
T02D2503-1:225b-18: gyi cho ga yis zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin
T02D2503-1:225b-20: 'das ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje h'um
T02D2503-1:225b-21: mdzad kyi sbyor ba'i phyag rgyas mchod pa rnam pa
T02D2503-1:225b-23: de bas na da ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bkrol la /
T02D2503-1:225b-24: khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis kyis gar gyi cho ga sgeg pa dang bcas pas bya'o //
T02D2503-1:225b-25: de bzhin du gar gyi cho ga bya ba bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:225b-26: ci zhig bya ba bstan pa'i phyir g-yon pa ni //
T02D2503-1:225b-27: khu tshur g-yas pas bzung nas su //
T02D2503-1:225b-29: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo snying ga'i thad kar gyen du bsgrengs la /
T02D2503-1:225b-30: g-yas pa'i mdzub me bsgreng ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng nas bzung ste /
T02D2503-1:225b-31: dbyig pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsgyur zhing thad kar btud nas /
T02D2503-1:225b-33: dpral ba gnyis la gzhag par bya //
T02D2503-1:225b-35: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i tse mo dpral bar gzhag pa ste /
T02D2503-1:225b-36: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag go zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:225b-37: 'di ni rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas su lan gyi gar gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D2503-1:225b-38: phyag rgya de bkrol la yang de bzhin du gar gyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:225b-39: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bzung ste /
T02D2503-1:225b-40: phyag rgya'i tshul du byas pa'i phyag rgya de kha phyir bstan te phab la /
T02D2503-1:225b-41: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du phyi rol du
T02D2503-1:225b-42: bskor ba 'di ni rdo rje nyi ma'i lan gyi
T02D2503-1:226a-2: phyag rgya de bkrol la de bzhin du gar gyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:226a-3: de bzhin du khu tshur g-yas pas g-yon pa bzung la /
T02D2503-1:226a-4: lag dar gnyis gshibs te gyen du bsgreng la /
T02D2503-1:226a-5: rgyal mtshan gyi tshul du bzung ba 'di ni rdo
T02D2503-1:226a-6: rje dpal gyi lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag
T02D2503-1:226a-7: rgya'o // yang phyag rgya de bkrol la de bzhin du gar gyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:226a-8: phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bcings la mdzub mo
T02D2503-1:226a-9: g-yas pa'i rtse mo g-yas pa'i mkhur tshos kyi phyogs
T02D2503-1:226a-10: su btud de / dgod pa bstan pa'i phyir sgeg

T02D2503-1:226a-13: su btud de / // mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
T02D2503-1:226a-14: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pas so //
T02D2503-1:226a-15: rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang //
T02D2503-1:226a-16: zhes bya ba ni rigs 'dir ni dbang bskur ba
T02D2503-1:226a-17: gtso bor gyur pa yin pas rgyal po'i pho brang
T02D2503-1:226a-19: de bas na 'di ni dzi:'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:226a-21: rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang //
T02D2503-1:226a-23: rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi kun ci zhig tu byed ce na /
T02D2503-1:226a-24: de'i phyir mnyes par byed ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:226a-25: rab tu dga' bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:226a-27: dbang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
T02D2503-1:226a-28: dbang ni dbang bskur ba byin pa'o //
T02D2503-1:226a-29: gzi brjid dang zhes pa ni rdo rje gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya bstan pas so //
T02D2503-1:226a-30: sbyin dang zhes pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas so //
T02D2503-1:226a-31: dgod pa ni rdo rje bzhad mo'i phyag rgya'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2503-1:226a-32: de ltar lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya bzhi byas nas /
T02D2503-1:226a-33: phyag rgya ji ltar bkrol ba de bzhin du thal mo brdab pa yang bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:226a-34: de nas gzhan yang nye ba'i gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:226a-35: de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni //
T02D2503-1:226a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:226a-37: de bzhin gar yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i cho gar bya ba bstan la /
T02D2503-1:226a-38: khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis snying gar phan tshun rtse sprad nas /
T02D2503-1:226a-39: padma'i 'dab ma'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2503-1:226a-40: snying gar gzhag pa ni snying gar kha 'bus pa sbyar ba yin no //
T02D2503-1:226a-41: de bzhin du 'dug pa phyag rgya g-yon logs su cung zad btud nas /

T02D2503-1:235a-18: rje khu tshur gyis gnas kyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2503-1:235a-19: rgya gang yin pa de gnyis su byas la /
T02D2503-1:235a-20: las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:235a-21: ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:235a-22: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ga yis //
T02D2503-1:235a-23: lcags kyus 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02D2503-1:235a-24: zhes bya la sogs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bstan pa rnams so //
T02D2503-1:235a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:235a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig go //
T02D2503-1:235a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig kyang yin la /
T02D2503-1:235a-28: rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po yang yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:235a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen
T02D2503-1:235a-30: po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po'o
T02D2503-1:235a-31: // de las rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye
T02D2503-1:235a-32: shes kyi mtshan ma'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2503-1:235a-33: cho ga rgyas pa ste cho ga'i rnam pa rdzogs
T02D2503-1:235a-35: / de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad
T02D2503-1:235a-36: pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2503-1:235a-37: rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel
T02D2503-1:235a-39: / de ltar rdo rje rigs su gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mdzad nas //
T02D2503-1:235a-40: las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:235b-0: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs @235b pa gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:235b-1: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
T02D2503-1:235b-2: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2503-1:235b-3: nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na /
T02D2503-1:235b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:235b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2503-1:235b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su gtogs
T02D2503-1:235b-8: pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi 'khor gyi dam
T02D2503-1:235b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig go //
T02D2503-1:235b-11: dam tshig ces bya ba'i sgra ni /
T02D2503-1:235b-12: 'dir sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha nyid la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-1:235b-13: de gang las 'byung ba der byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:235b-14: ting nge 'dzin gang don dang mthun pa'i ming 'di
T02D2503-1:235b-15: nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
T02D2503-1:235b-16: par zhugs pa'o / 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs
T02D2503-1:235b-17: la gnas pa'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
T02D2503-1:235b-18: par zhugs pa'o / gsungs so // lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02D2503-1:235b-19: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
T02D2503-1:235b-20: na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa'i cho
T02D2503-1:235b-21: ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2503-1:235b-22: / de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
T02D2503-1:235b-23: yang zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po mngon
T02D2503-1:235b-24: par rtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o
T02D2503-1:235b-25: // byang chub chen por sems dpa' 'di la mnga' bas na /
T02D2503-1:235b-26: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2503-1:235b-27: 'di'i phyag na rdo rje mnga' bas na /
T02D2503-1:235b-29: rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
T02D2503-1:235b-30: lha mo rnams rang gi snying ga nas bskyed pa
T02D2503-1:235b-31: ni / rnal 'byor du snyoms par zhugs pa las sprul ba'o //
T02D2503-1:235b-32: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs ba dang /
T02D2503-1:235b-34: mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad grub pa ni /
T02D2503-1:235b-35: las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D2503-1:235b-36: de byed pa ste nyams su len pa'o //
T02D2503-1:235b-37: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
T02D2503-1:235b-38: dgos pa byed pa nyid do //
T02D2503-1:235b-39: der yang dag par sbyor ba ni de'i dgos pa
T02D2503-1:235b-40: byed pa nyid kyi phyir legs par sbyor bas na
T02D2503-1:235b-41: / yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
T02D2503-1:235b-43: de la sogs pa de dag kyang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2503-1:236a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par
T02D2503-1:236a-2: 'phrul pa byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2503-1:236a-3: gsungs te / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul yin pas na sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul te /
T02D2503-1:236a-4: sems kyis rnal 'byor pa nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-5: rnam par 'phrul pa ni nyid kyi ngo mtshar gyi
T02D2503-1:236a-6: chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa ste
T02D2503-1:236a-7: / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs
T02D2503-1:236a-8: pa na long ba rnams kyis mig thob pa dang
T02D2503-1:236a-9: / / 'on ba rnams kyis sgra thos pa la sogs ba lta bu'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-10: de ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T02D2503-1:236a-11: da ni bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:236a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
T02D2503-1:236a-13: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2503-1:236a-14: / rdo rje rigs kyi las yin pas na rdo rje las te /
T02D2503-1:236a-15: de'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-16: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-17: de nas zhes bya ba ni gnas skabs so //
T02D2503-1:236a-18: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la yang me'i rab tu byed
T02D2503-1:236a-19: pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pa
T02D2503-1:236a-20: yin pa'i phyir / yang dag par rab tu phye ste bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-22: las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:236a-23: dam pa zhes bya ba ni don che ba'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-24: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2503-1:236a-26: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2503-1:236a-28: rdo rje dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-29: ming ji skad ces bya ba ci zhig ce na /
T02D2503-1:236a-30: las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do //
T02D2503-1:236a-32: ming las kyi rdo rje zhes btags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:236a-33: ji ltar thig gdab par bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:236a-35: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2503-1:236a-36: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
T02D2503-1:236a-38: dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:236a-39: bri ba'i go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:236a-40: dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni //
T02D2503-1:236a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2503-1:236a-42: dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni //
T02D2503-1:236a-43: sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya //
T02D2503-1:236a-44: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:236b-0: @236b sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du //
T02D2503-1:236b-1: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de'i phyogs bzhir
T02D2503-1:236b-2: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2503-1:236b-3: zhes pa'o // dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang //
T02D2503-1:236b-4: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D2503-1:236b-5: rdo rje gtso sogs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2503-1:236b-6: rnams kyi gtso bo yin pas na rdo rje gtso
T02D2503-1:236b-7: bo ste / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02D2503-1:236b-8: de thog mar byas nas lhag ma rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:236b-9: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten skyong ba
T02D2503-1:236b-10: rnams rim bzhin rang rang gi mtshan mas mnan pa
T02D2503-1:236b-11: ste g-yon brkyang ba mi dgos par steng du bri
T02D2503-1:236b-12: bar bya'o // de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du //
T02D2503-1:236b-13: zhes bya ba ni gnas bcu drug po rnams su'o //
T02D2503-1:236b-14: mchod pa chen po rnams gzhag go //
T02D2503-1:236b-15: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so /
T02D2503-1:236b-16: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do zhes bya
T02D2503-1:236b-17: ba ni phyag rgya rnams kyi rig pa la phyag
T02D2503-1:236b-18: rgya zhes bya ba'i sgrar gsungs so //
T02D2503-1:236b-19: de ltar phyag rgya rnams kyi rig pa bstan nas /
T02D2503-1:236b-20: da ni slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug
T02D2503-1:236b-21: pa'i cho ga sngar rgyas par smras pa nyid mdor
T02D2503-1:236b-22: bsdus nas phyogs tsam bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:236b-23: cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas
T02D2503-1:236b-24: te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2503-1:236b-25: no // de ltar mdor bsdu ba byas nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2503-1:236b-26: rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2503-1:236b-27: rdo rje rigs kyi las yin pas na rdo rje rigs kyi las te /
T02D2503-1:236b-28: de'i ye shes ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes te de bslab par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:236b-29: go rims gang gis she na /
T02D2503-1:236b-30: de'i phyir de la dang po nyid zhi ba la
T02D2503-1:236b-31: sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya
T02D2503-1:236b-32: ba gsungs te / 'di ni las kyi dkyil 'khor yin par bstan la /
T02D2503-1:236b-33: de bas na gang la la zhig las 'di byed
T02D2503-1:236b-34: par 'dod pa des dkyil 'khor chen po 'am phyag
T02D2503-1:236b-36: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor las dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba cig bri bar bya ste /
T02D2503-1:236b-37: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2503-1:236b-38: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang las kyi
T02D2503-1:236b-39: dkyil 'khor de'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin par
T02D2503-1:237a-0: snying po dang phyag rgya 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phyir @237a * //
T02D2503-1:237a-2: / de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2503-1:237a-3: sgor zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su
T02D2503-1:237a-4: mthun pa'i tshe na dkar po la sogs pas me
T02D2503-1:237a-7: gru gsum bri bar bya zhing phyag rgya de yang der dgod par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:237a-8: zhi ba la ni padma'i steng du padma'o//
T02D2503-1:237a-9: rgyas pa la ni 'khor lo'i steng du rin po che'o //
T02D2503-1:237a-10: mngon spyod la ni rdo rje'am /
T02D2503-1:237a-11: mdung rtse gsum pa'i steng du rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237a-12: de nas lha rnams spyan drangs la /
T02D2503-1:237a-13: las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2503-1:237a-14: chos kyi phyag rgya brjod de /
T02D2503-1:237a-15: mchod pa byas nas bshos dang gtor ma'i las bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237a-16: de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i stan 'jam pa'am sra ba'am /
T02D2503-1:237a-17: tshul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste /
T02D2503-1:237a-18: zhi ba'i las la ni stan 'jam po la 'dug nas /
T02D2503-1:237a-19: g-yas nas bskor bas ku sha bkram ste me thab
T02D2503-1:237a-20: tu yam shing mngar po rnams kyis me sbar la
T02D2503-1:237a-21: / 'dod pa'i rgyal pos me lha spyan drang ngo //
T02D2503-1:237a-22: spyan drangs pas na me thab kyi nang du dgug pa dang /
T02D2503-1:237a-26: byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir pho nya'i tshogs
T02D2503-1:237a-27: rnams kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i sa pa rnams kyis
T02D2503-1:237a-30: pho nya'i tshogs las 'byung ba'i sngags kyi chu la bzlas nas /
T02D2503-1:237a-31: des yo byad thams cad gsang zhing bskor te /
T02D2503-1:237a-32: 'thor 'thung lan gsum phul la dri dang /
T02D2503-1:237a-35: bshos la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D2503-1:237a-36: de nas bdag gis pha rol du sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams /
T02D2503-1:237a-38: de'i pha rol du bsgrub par bya ba'i lha /
T02D2503-1:237a-39: bdag po'i mdun du yid kyis legs par bsam mo //
T02D2503-1:237a-40: de nas khro bo gang yang rung ba'i ting nge
T02D2503-1:237a-41: 'dzin du zhugs te mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas
T02D2503-1:237a-42: las dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237a-43: de nas sreg rdzas re re zhing yang me la dgang blugs gsum gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237a-44: phul nas bskor zhing 'thor 'thung gsum phul la /
T02D2503-1:237a-45: dri dang me tog gis kyang mchod do //
T02D2503-1:237a-46: de nas me lha zhugs thas kyi mdun du dbang po lta bur bzhag la /
T02D2503-1:237b-0: lha dang de'i bdag po la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya @237b ste;/
T02D2503-1:237b-1: bdag po la yang gong ma bzhin du 'thor 'thung phul la dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02D2503-1:237b-3: nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul lo //
T02D2503-1:237b-4: de nas de bzhin du 'thor 'thung byas la dri dang me tog phul te /
T02D2503-1:237b-5: mdun du bzhugs su gsol nas der sbyin sreg dbul
T02D2503-1:237b-6: bar bya ba'i rang gi lha gang yin pa de
T02D2503-1:237b-7: shin tu nye bar zhugs su gsol zhing zhugs thab
T02D2503-1:237b-8: kyi mdun gyi dbus su bzhag la de bzhin du
T02D2503-1:237b-11: de nas til bsregs la sdig pa bsreg par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:237b-12: gang gi sdig pa bsreg par 'dod pa de'i lus mgo nas rkang pa'i bar thog thag nas /
T02D2503-1:237b-13: mi bkren pa bzhin du gzhag cing mi sdug pa drangs te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-14: nyin re bzhin de ltar sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2503-1:237b-15: de yang sdig pa dang bral bar bsams te de ltar sdig pa bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-16: ldang ba'i tshe na yang rang gi lha la 'thor
T02D2503-1:237b-17: 'thung lan gsum phul te dri dang me tog la
T02D2503-1:237b-19: de nas yang bdag po la 'thor 'thung phul la /
T02D2503-1:237b-20: 'byor pa ci yod pas sbyin sreg byas nas yang 'thog 'thung dbul lo //
T02D2503-1:237b-21: de nas dri dang me tog la sogs pas kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-22: de nas me la yang de bzhin du byas la
T02D2503-1:237b-23: de'i 'og tu 'byor pa yod na me lha la
T02D2503-1:237b-24: yang dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-25: rang gi lha dang bdag po la ni thog ma
T02D2503-1:237b-26: dang tha ma gnyi gar dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o
T02D2503-1:237b-27: // de ltar zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2503-1:237b-29: ji srid 'dod par dkyil 'khor gshegs su mi gsol ba nyid du me'i bya ba bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-30: de nas mjug tu 'byor pa ci yod pas thams cad mchod la bzod par gsol te /
T02D2503-1:237b-31: dkyil 'khor dgrol ba'i tshul gyis gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2503-1:237b-32: cho ga 'di ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga
T02D2503-1:237b-33: thams cad la yang spyi'i cho ga yin par shes
T02D2503-1:237b-34: par bya'o // 'bras kyi sbyin sreg gis kyang rang
T02D2503-1:237b-35: gi lha dang me lha shin tu tshim zhing dgyes
T02D2503-1:237b-36: par bya'o // par bsam zhing / de gnyis de
T02D2503-1:237b-37: ltar mnyes pas rang gi khyim yang yo byad sna
T02D2503-1:237b-38: tshogs kyis yongs su 'gengs par mdzad par bsams te
T02D2503-1:237b-39: par bya'o // par bsam zhing / / de lta bus ni khyim rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:237b-40: d'ur ba'i myu gu mar dang bcas pas kyang rang
T02D2503-1:237b-41: gi lha dang me lha yongs su tshim zhing mnyes
T02D2503-1:238a-2: de gnyis kyi bcud kyis len la sogs pa'i sbyor ba nyid mdzad de /
T02D2503-1:238a-3: yun ring bar gnas pa dang /
T02D2503-1:238a-5: stobs kyis rgyas pa la sogs pa dang ldan par mdzad par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2503-1:238a-6: de lta bus ni tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:238a-7: ku sha'i myu gu 'bru mar du btags ba'i sbyin sreg byas la 'di ltar bsam la /
T02D2503-1:238a-8: 'jigs pa gang gis gang zhig nyen par gyur pa'i
T02D2503-1:238a-9: 'jigs pa'i rgyu de ku sha'i myu gu 'bru mar
T02D2503-1:238a-10: dang bcas pa 'bar bas de'i mod la phal bar
T02D2503-1:238a-11: brlag par bsams na 'jigs pa'i rgyu sreg pas rtag
T02D2503-1:238a-13: da ni yam shing tsha ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas las gzhan ston te /
T02D2503-1:238a-14: sngags pas yam shing tsha ba las me sbar te /
T02D2503-1:238a-15: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog mar yam shing tsha ba las me sbar la /
T02D2503-1:238a-16: sbyin sreg byed bzhin pa nyid kyi tshe ni tsha ba'i shing med na /
T02D2503-1:238a-17: phyis ni gzhan las sbar yang 'gal ba med do zhes shes so //
T02D2503-1:238a-18: se ba zhes bya ba ni se ba dang /
T02D2503-1:238a-19: rgya shug la sogs pa shing tsher ma can gyis sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2503-1:238a-20: me dang rang gi lha kha lo ba lta bu
T02D2503-1:238a-21: gnyis bsgrub par bya ba glang po che lta bu'i
T02D2503-1:238a-23: ci dga' bar khrid de byon par bsam ste /
T02D2503-1:238a-24: de ltar se ba'i tsher mas 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:238a-25: de dag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni tsha ba nyid do //
T02D2503-1:238a-26: khro ba dang ldan par zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /

T02D2503-1:238b-14: 'bras bu dang me tog skyur ba rnams kyis sbyin

T02D2503-1:238b-31: mi snang me tog sdong bu yis //
T02D2503-1:238b-32: zhes bya ba la mi snang ba'i me tog ni //

T02D2503-1:238b-38: zhes bya ba ni sbyin sreg byas na dga' nas mi snang ba ste /

T02D2503-1:239a-18: gang du dga' ba der song ste ltung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2503-1:239a-19: de ltar na bka' bzhin byed pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:239a-21: khro dang ldan ba zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs par gyur pa'o //

T02D2503-1:239a-29: de lta na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02D2503-1:239a-30: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni las dman pa rnams la mi sbyor zhing gtse bar mi bya'o //

T02D2503-1:239a-33: sbyor ba 'di bstan pa yin no //

T02D2503-1:239a-36: phyag na rdo rje yin par nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2503-1:239a-37: mthu che zhing drag po yang sbyor ba 'dis dbang du byed do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2503-1:239a-38: de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur te /

T02D2503-1:239b-0: de nas zhes bya ba ni de phan @239b chad do //
T02D2503-1:239b-1: gsang ba ni sbas pa la bya ste /

T02D2503-1:239b-3: yid 'ong bud med ces bya ba ni gang zhig

T02D2503-1:239b-6: pa de ni de'i yid du 'ong ba'i bud med

T02D2503-1:239b-8: phyag rgya de'i bu gar aanydza na bcug la /
T02D2503-1:239b-9: bkan nas mtshan thog thag tu sngags sam snying po brjod pas bskul bar bya'o //

T02D2503-1:239b-15: mtshan thog thag phyag rgya mi dgrol bar snying po
T02D2503-1:239b-16: bzlas brjod byas la nang par des mig bskus na
T02D2503-1:239b-17: sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //

T02D2503-1:239b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2503-1:239b-25: gal te bug de gan rgyal du 'jog kyang srid pas de'i phyir /
T02D2503-1:239b-26: rdo rje bsdams pas de g-yogs te zhes bya ba gsungs so //

T02D2503-1:239b-31: rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba de srid kyi bar du

T02D2503-1:239b-36: 'gul bas ni dbang du byed pa'o //
T02D2503-1:239b-37: dro bas ni rkang mgyogs su 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:239b-38: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:239b-39: 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:239b-40: go ro tsa na bu gar bcug / ces bya ba la /
T02D2503-1:239b-41: su'i bu gar gzhug ce na /
T02D2503-1:239b-43: gsang ba'i khu tshur gyis btsir bar //
T02D2503-1:239b-44: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis go ro tsa
T02D2503-1:239b-45: na de g-yogs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2503-1:239b-46: // gsang ba'i khu tshur ni 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2503-1:239b-47: rnam par rgyal ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo
T02D2503-1:239b-48: rje khu tshur gyi gnas su las kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D2503-1:239b-49: nang gi khu tshur gang yin pa de ni gsang

T02D2503-1:240a-0: de'i che de bsrung ba byas la @240a * //

T02D2503-1:244a-27: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2503-1:244a-28: zhes bya ba ni gsang ste byung bas na gsang
T02D2503-1:244a-29: ba ste / sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor re rer zhugs pa dang /
T02D2503-1:244a-30: rtse gcig par gyur na snang ba skye ba gang
T02D2503-1:244a-31: yin pa de ni rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i
T02D2503-1:244a-33: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2503-1:244a-35: dkyil 'khor legs par zhugs nas ni//
T02D2503-1:244a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de ston pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:244a-37: legs par zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang /
T02D2503-1:244a-38: rdo rje phra mo dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i
T02D2503-1:244a-39: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po sngar
T02D2503-1:244a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi las la mkhas pa dang /
T02D2503-1:244a-42: yo byad dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2503-1:244a-43: grogs bzang po yod pa dang /
T02D2503-1:244a-44: grub pa'i mtshan ma thob na legs par zhugs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:244a-45: phyag rgya chen po mchog nas pa //
T02D2503-1:244a-47: phyag rgya chen po zhes smos pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po gzung ngo //
T02D2503-1:244a-48: mchog smos pa ni bsgoms pa phul du byung ba la bya ste /
T02D2503-1:244b-0: de la gnas pas na mchog @244b tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2503-1:244b-1: gnas na rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba ni lhan cig tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-1:244b-2: gang dang lhan cig gnas she na /
T02D2503-1:244b-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ngo //
T02D2503-1:244b-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2503-1:244b-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bsgom zhing mtshan thog thag lhan cig tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2503-1:244b-7: de ltar gnas pa'i dis cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2503-1:244b-8: de'i phyir rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba gsungs so /
T02D2503-1:244b-9: gal te rdo rje h'um zhes bya bar gyur na de ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2503-1:244b-11: las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D2503-1:244b-12: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2503-1:244b-13: de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba
T02D2503-1:244b-14: bzhin du bslab bo zhes bya ba ni gal te
T02D2503-1:244b-15: der gzhan dag kyang zhugs par gyur na /
T02D2503-1:244b-16: de nas de la phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslab ste /
T02D2503-1:244b-17: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2503-1:244b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa dang ;
T02D2503-1:244b-19: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dngos grub sa la bris pa'i
T02D2503-1:244b-20: dkyil 'khor la ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du
T02D2503-1:244b-21: ras dang rtsig pa la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-1:244b-22: bris pa la yang de dang 'dra bar shes par
T02D2503-1:244b-23: bya'o // gzugs thams cad la yang zhes bya ba
T02D2503-1:244b-24: ni gser la sogs pa las byas pa zhig yin
T02D2503-1:244b-25: na yang dngos grub tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o
T02D2503-1:244b-26: bya'o // // de lon nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher
T02D2503-1:244b-27: bshad pa kos la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2503-1:244b-28: rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2503-1:244b-30: / de ltar dkyil 'khor drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T02D2503-1:244b-31: da ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rtog
T02D2503-1:244b-32: pa chen po'i rgyal po 'di yun ring du gnas
T02D2503-1:244b-33: par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2503-1:244b-34: la bos te / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2503-1:244b-35: pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin
T02D2503-1:244b-37: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga'
T02D2503-1:244b-38: pa bzhin du bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob
T02D2503-1:244b-39: par bgyi ba'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni byin
T02D2503-1:244b-40: gyis brlab par gsol ba yin te /
T02D2503-1:244b-41: dga' ba med pas dngos grub thams cad thob par mdzod cig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2503-1:244b-42: de ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D2503-1:245a-1: de'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
T02D2503-1:245a-2: gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te zhes bya ba ni
T02D2503-1:245a-3: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa'i
T02D2503-1:245a-4: rgyal po'i snyoms par zhugs pa la ltos te /
T02D2503-1:245a-5: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ;
T02D2503-1:245a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa yin te /
T02D2503-1:245a-7: de bas na legs so zhes bya ba bzhi dang /
T02D2503-1:245a-8: legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab cing
T02D2503-1:245a-9: bdag gi mdzad pa yongs su gzung ba yin no
T02D2503-1:245a-10: // rdo rje rnams kyi theg pa yin pas na rdo rje'i theg pa ste /
T02D2503-1:245a-11: rdo rje ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yin la /
T02D2503-1:245a-12: de rnams kyi theg pa yin pas na rdo rje'i theg pa ste /
T02D2503-1:245a-14: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2503-1:245a-16: 'di'i gong na gzhan med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
T02D2503-1:245a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'jig rten
T02D2503-1:245a-18: gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su ston pas
T02D2503-1:245a-19: na gsang ba'o // ci'i phyir nyid kyi sku sbas
T02D2503-1:245a-20: te rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis
T02D2503-1:245a-21: na gsang ba'o // bzhugs she na / de ni
T02D2503-1:245a-22: theg pa chen po la sems can gdul ba'i thabs
T02D2503-1:245a-23: kyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa yod pa'i nang
T02D2503-1:245a-24: na gtso bo yin pa'i phyir theg pa chen po
T02D2503-1:245a-25: na gsang ba'o // bzhugs she na / mngon du
T02D2503-1:245a-26: 'dus pa'o// 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yongs su
T02D2503-1:245a-27: na gsang ba'o // bzhugs she na / mngon du
T02D2503-1:245a-28: 'dus pa'o// rdzogs pa'o // de bzhin na gshegs pa
T02D2503-1:245a-29: thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin pas na
T02D2503-1:245a-30: na gsang ba'o // bzhugs she na / mngon du
T02D2503-1:245a-31: 'dus pa'o// rdzogs pa'o // / de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2503-1:245a-32: thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
T02D2503-1:245a-33: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon
T02D2503-1:245a-34: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid 'jig rten gsum
T02D2503-1:245a-35: las rnam par rgyal bar mdzad de /
T02D2503-1:245a-36: de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya'o //
T02D2503-1:245a-37: de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2503-1:245a-38: rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
T02D2503-1:245a-39: po las / rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje h'um mdzad de /
T02D2503-1:245a-40: de'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
T02D2503-1:245a-41: de'i rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa yongs su rdzogs so /
T02D2503-1:245a-43: // / de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgya cher bshad
T02D2503-1:245a-44: pa ko sa la'i rgyan las 'jig rten gsum las
